He needs this loan to manage good maintenance of his yucca crop.  He will use things like fertilizers and agricultural chemicals in the hope that the results will be satisfactory at harvest time.  He hopes to receive a loan from Kiva to complete the work that he has planned.

His dream is to become a major root and tuber producer and to provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and agricultural chemicals for his yucca crop

loans.name: Norys Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia is a member of the Communal Bank group "The untouchables" located in the district, province and department of Puno. She is 29 years old and married with one child. She completed secondary school. 

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan was for the amount of 500 PEN, to support her cosmetics selling business. 

Sonia is now asking for a loan for 800 PEN, to increase her working capital. Her dream is to grow her business.

The thing she likes most about Communal Bank is the earnings on her savings.

loans.use: Increase the capital in her business selling cosmetics

loans.name: Julia Noemí

texts.es: Doña Julia, tiene 26 años de edad, es casada, de oficio comerciante, tiene 1 hijo, cursó el tercer grado básico, es una persona emprendedora porque se dedica a la elaboración de bordados de blusas de marcador, con esta actividad ha logrado salir adelante con el negocio que tiene, quiere ampliar su capital de trabajo, ya que para este fin de año llega a tener demanda el producto que ella elabora. Tiene como objetivo principal agrandar su negocio y asi poder tener mejores ingreso y una mejor condicion de vida.
texts.en: Doña Julia, 26, is married with 1 child.  She works as a merchant.  She only has three years of schooling.  She is an enterprising woman and operates a business embroidering blouses.  The business is her livelihood now and she wants to increase her working capital before the end of the year because she expects demand for her work to grow.  Her goal is to grow her business so that she can increase her income and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Eduardo Jose

texts.es:
Eduardo José  es Soltero,con muchos deseos de superacion, actualmente estudia la carrera de ING, en ZOOTECNIA, habita en la colonia Los Laurele, labora en la finca de su papá realizando actividades pecuarias con su pequeño inventario ganadero, como  tambien actividades agricolas, desde su niñez se ha dedicado a esta labor, siendo sus principales fuentes de ingreso.  

Solicita este financiamiento para compra de ternero de desarrollo, logrando de esta manera aumentar su inventario ganadero y en el transcurso de un año poder vender animales de peso que generen mayores ingresos y de esta menara mejorar la economia del hogar, en su comunidad lo consideran como un hombre de progreso, dedidicado  y responsable.

Se siente muy agradecido con KIVA ya que le brinda apoyo para poder hacer realidad su sueño de seguir progresando hasta llegar a ser un asendado en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Eduardo José is single, and he has a great desire to prevail.  He is currently studying for a career in biological engineering.  He lives in the Los Laurele neighborhood, and he works on his father’s farm.  He does work with his small inventory of cattle.  He also farms.  He has been doing this work ever since his childhood.  They are his primary sources of income.

He is requesting this loan to buy a calf to raise.  This way he will increase his livestock inventory.  In a year’s time he will be able to sell the animals at a weight that will generate greater income.  This will improve his household’s financial situation.  His community considers him to be a progressive, dedicated, and responsible man.

He is very grateful to Kiva for providing him the support to be able to make his dream a reality.  He dreams of continuing to progress until he comes to be an established person in his community.

loans.use: Buy a calf to raise

loans.name: Otilda Marta

texts.es: Doña Otilia, tiene 47 años de edad, es casada, de oficios domésticos,  tiene  3 hijos de los cuales 1 va a la escuela, ella cursó el sexto grado de educación primaria, es una persona que se dedica a la artesanía (tejeduría), se ha dedicado a esta actividad desde hace 2 años, quiere ampliar su capital de trabajo y poder competir en su negocio para que pueda de esa manera mejorar sus ingresos y también su condición de vida.
texts.en: Doña Otilia, 47, is married and has 3 children. She left school after the sixth grade. She has operated a business making and selling woven crafts for 2 years.  She wants to increase her working capital to make her business more competitive. Her goal is to increase her income and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Maria Siriaca

texts.es:
Maria Siriaca de 64 años de edad su nucleo familiar esta conformado por 6 hijos todos mayores de edad 2 que trabajan en conjunto con ella y 4 que estan en el extranjero, ella es  habitante de colonia Los Laureles, labora en su pequeña unidad de producción en la que realiza actividades pecuarias con su pequeño inventario ganadero, como  tambien actividades agricolas, las que en conjunto funcionan como eje principal para el bien economico de su familia, sus hijos tambien colaboran enviandoles remesas para sus gastos y proyectos.  

Necesita este financiamiento para compra de ternero de desarrollo, logrando de esta manera aumentar su inventario ganadero y en el transcurso de un año poder vender animales de peso que generen mayores ingresos.   

En su comunidad la consideran como una persona progresiva, trabajadora y responsable,  espera ser beneficiado con el fondo KIVA con el cual pretende cumplir con sus compromisos para saguir trabajando y por lo tanto hara que sus sueños se le hagan realidades.
texts.en:
Maria Siriaca is 64 years old. Her family consists of six grown children, two of whom work with her, and four of whom are abroad. She is a resident of the Los Laureles area, and works in a small production unit raising livestock. She also works in agriculture, which is the economic base for her family. Her children also cooperate, sending her remittances for her expenses and projects.

She needs this loan to purchase calves for raising. This way, she will increase her livestock inventory and in the course of a year, she will be able to sell heavy animals for a better income.

In her community, she is considered to be a progressive, hardworking, and responsible person. She hopes to benefit from a Kiva loan, which she promises to pay back, in order to continue working and make her dreams into realities.

loans.use: Purchase calves to raise

loans.name: Santa Dorotea

texts.es: Doña Santa T., tiene 42 años de edad, de oficios costurera, tiene 1 hijo, ella cursó los grados de primaria en la escuela, es una persona trabajadora, y se dedica a la confección de ropa, actividad que lleva realizando desde hace 12 años, solicita un prestamos para ampliar su capital de trabajo, ya que quiere que sus ingresos se incrementen, para esto ella tiene que invertir más capital, solo así podrá mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Doña Santa T., 42, a seamstress by trade, has 1 child.  She only has a few years of schooling.  She is a hard-working woman and operates a business making and selling clothing, a business that she started 12 years ago.  She is applying for a loan to expand her working capital because she wants to increase her income.  She needs to invest more funds in her business because that's the only way that she can increase her earnings.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Otoniel Vitalino

texts.es: Don Otoniel, es de 38 años de edad, de oficio tejedor, tiene 1 hijo que está estudiando actualmente, solo estudio la primaria pero ha sido una persona que ha puesto su empeño en sostener a su familia, quiere ampliar su producción de tejeduría, para lo cual es necesario ampliar su capital de trabajo, para comprar más materia prima (hilo), y así poder tejer nuevos diseños en el arte que realizar, lleva con este trabajo once años, por lo que tiene grandes expectativas de superarse mas.
texts.en:
Don Otoniel, 38, is a weaver. He has a son who is currently in school. Don only finished primary school, but he has always prioritized working to support his family. Don wants to expand his weaving workshop, and to do this he needs more working capital to buy raw materials like thread so that he can weave new designs. 

Don has been weaving for 11 years, and has great expectations of furthering developing his work.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Remigia

texts.en:
Remigia is a member of the Communal Bank group "Active Women II" located in the district of Juliaca, the province of San Román, and the department of Puno. She is 51 years old and married with four children (three of whom are independent). She studied until the fifth year of primary school.

Remigia has worked with Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan was for 500 PEN, to increase the capital for her sound system rental business. 

She is now asking for a loan of 800 PEN, to buy construction materials for her hardware store and for her sound system rental business.  

Her dream is to expand her hardware store and to have more equipment. 	

Her favorite thing about the Communal Bank is its monthly meetings, because it is a distraction and the good exchange of words between the bank's members.

loans.use: The purchase of additional construction materials for her business renting out sound equipment

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: Don Manuel, es de 25 años de edad, casado,tiene 3 hijos de la cuales 2 estan estudiando, paga los studio de sus hijos que quieren que sean profesionales en alguna carrera o desempeño. Se dedica a la artesania, lo que es la elaboracion de bordados, trabajo que viene realizando desde haces 10 años; cuenta co0n el apoyo de sus familiares lo cual han hecho que se negocio sea prospero. Quiere ampliar su capital de trabajo para compera de materia prima lo que es hilo de lustrina, su negocio es rentable por no que tiene grandes espectativas en el negocio que realiza, y de esta forma podra darle un mejor futuro a su hijos y su familia.
texts.en: Manuel is 25 years old, married and has 3 children, two of whom are in school.  He pays for his children's studies because he wants them to be professionals with a career.  Manuel makes handicrafts.  He makes embroideries which he has been doing for 10 years.  He has the support of his family members which has helped his business flourish. He would like to expand his working capital to purchase raw materials, specifically silk thread.  His business is profitable and has good prospects.  He therefore hopes to be able to provide his children and his family with a better future.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Regina Maruja

texts.en:
Regina is a member of the Communal Bank group "Great Power" located in the district of Ilave, in the province of El Collao, and the department of Puno. She is 44 years old and married with three children. She has a primary school education.

Regina has worked with Manuela Ramos for two years. Her first loan was for the amount of 500 PEN, to increase the amount of merchandise in her business, which consists of the purchase and sale of "chuños" (dehydrated potatoes).  Regina sells them in the nearby city of Juliaca. 

She is now asking for a loan for 500 PEN, to increase her inventory and sales.

Her dream is to have her children study and attain their higher education degrees.  Her favorite part about working with the Communal Bank is its loan terms and the savings.

loans.use: Increasing her business buying and selling "chuños" (dehydrated potatoes)

loans.name: Tomasa Candelaria

texts.es: Doña Tomasa, tiene 34 años de edad, soltera, tiene oficios domesticos, labora como conserje en una establecimiento educativo, con lo devenga un salario para su sostenimiento. ha laborando de hace un buen tiempo y tiene deseos de superacion, ya que solocita un prestamo que le servira para compra de libros, los cuales le servira para tener un mejor conocimiento en cuanto a la actividad que realiza. Quiere superarse intelectualmente, para que de esta forma devengar un mejor salario.
texts.en: Tomasa is 34 years old, single and does domestic work. She works as a janitor in an educational establishment thereby earning a salary for her support. She has been working for a good time and has desires to get ahead since she is requesting a loan which will be used to buy books which she'll use to gain better knowledge of the job she performs. She wishes to move forward intellectually so she can earn a better salary.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Yaneth Karina

texts.es:
Yaneth es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Activas II”, ubicado en el distrito Juliaca, provincia San Román, departamento de Puno, tiene 23 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y no tiene hijos, la señora tiene estudios de educación superior completa.

Yaneth viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 06 meses,  nos cuenta que su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de calzados.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le servirá para comprar insumos para su negocio de venta de calzados.
	
Su sueño es tener una empresa más grande y tener maquinarias para la fabricación.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo y el apoyo entre socias.
texts.en:
Yaneth is a member of the "Mujeres Activas II" community bank, located in the Juliaca district, San Roman province, Puno department. She is 23 years old, lives with her boyfriend and does not have children. She has completed her higher education studies.

Yaneth has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for six months. She tells us that her initial loan was for 500 new soles that was used to increase the capital for her business selling shoes.

She will request a new loan of 800 new soles, which will be used to buy stock for her shoe-selling business.

Her dream is to have a larger business and have fabrication machines.

What she likes most about her community bank is the ease of the loan and support among members.

loans.use: Buy stock for her business selling shoes.

loans.name: Zulma Iraday

texts.es:
Zulma es socia del Banco Comunal “Inka Wasi”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia Puno, departamento de Puno, tiene 34 años de edad, de estado civil casada, grado de instrucción superior completo, con tres hijos a su cargo.
Zulma,  se dedica a la venta de lentes y viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos  desde hace cuatro años, el primer préstamo fue de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles el cual le sirvió para incrementar los productos de su negocio.
La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 400.00 Nuevos soles, el cual invertirá en su negocio.
Su sueño es tener una óptica. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es el plazo de trabajo.
texts.en:
Zulma is a member of the "Inka Wasi" community bank, located in the Puno district, Puno province, Puno department. She is 34 years old, married, has completed higher education and has three children in her care.

Zulma is dedicated to selling eye glasses and has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for four years. The first loan was for 300 new soles which was used to increase the number of products in her business.

She is requesting a new loan of 400 new soles which will be invested in her business. Her dream is to have an opticians shop. What she likes about her community bank is the working time limits.

loans.use: Invest in her business selling glasses.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Clavelinas”, ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 30 años de edad, de estado civil casada y con tres hijos.           La señora solo tiene estudios de educación primara completa.
Olga viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 2 años, nos cuenta que el primer préstamo fue de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, el cual le sirvió para incrementar el capital de su negocio de compra y venta de chuño.
La señora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 800.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le servirá para invertir en su negocio actual que es el engorde de ganado vacuno.
Su sueño es tener su negocio grande  y comprarse un auto.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es el ahorro y la transparencia.
texts.en:
Olga is a member of the "Mujeres Clavelinas" community bank, located in the Llave district, El Collao province, Puno department. She is 30 years old and is married with three children. She has completed only elementary school.

Olga has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for two years. She tells us that her first loan was for 300 new soles, which was used to increase the capital for her business buying and selling cornstarch. She is requesting a new loan of 800 new soles, which will be used to invest in her current business which is fattening cattle.

Her dream is to have a big business and to buy herself a car. What she likes about her community bank is the savings and the transparancy.

loans.use: Invest in the business of fattening cattle.

loans.name: Paula Genara

texts.es:
Paula es socia del Banco Comunal “Santiago Patrón”, ubicado en el distrito Santiago D. Pupuja, provincia D. Azángaro, departamento D. Puno, tiene 46 años D. edad, D. estado civil  casada y tiene 06 hijos (04 independientes), la señora  estudio hasta 5to D. educación  primaria.

Paula viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 3 años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital D. su negocio D. venta D. carne, chuño y papa.

La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma D. S/. 3000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá comprando carne, chuño y papa para su negocio.

Su sueño es tener un carro para llevar sus productos.

Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal es la facilidad D. préstamo, las reuniones y las charlas.
texts.en:
Paula is a member of the "Santiago Patron" community bank, located in the Santiago D. Pupuja district, Azangaro province, Puno department. She is 46 years old, is married and has six children (4 adults). She studied up until fifth year of elementary school.

Paula has been working with the Manuela Ramos community bank for three years. The first loan requested was for 300 new soles, which was used to increase the capital of her business selling meat, cornstarch and potatoes.

She will request a new loan for the sum of 3,000 new soles which will be invested in purchasing meat, cornstarch and potatoes for her business.

Her dream is to have a car to transport her products.

What she likes most about her community bank is the ease of the loans, the meetings and the talks.

loans.use: Purchase meat, cornstarch and potatoes for her business.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es:
Petrona es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón de Jesús”, ubicado en el distrito Juliaca, provincia San Román, departamento de Puno, tiene 54 años de edad, de estado civil soltera y con 02 hijos (01 independiente), la señora tiene estudios hasta educación secundaria completa.

Petrona viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela R. desde hace 05 meses,  nos cuenta que su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de golosinas.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 700.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le servirá para comprar más insumos para su negocio.
	
Su sueño es tener una tienda segura donde pueda vender ropas.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la facilidad del préstamo y los consejos que dan.
texts.en:
Petrona is a member of the “Corazón de Jesús” community bank, located in the Juliaca district, San Roman province, Puno department. She is 54 years old, is single and has two children (1 adult). She has completed her high school education.

Petrona has been working with the Manuela R. Movement for five months. She tells us that her initial loan was for 500 new soles, which was used to increase the capital of her business selling candy.

She will request a new loan of 700 new soles which will be used to purchase more stock for her business.

Her dream is to have a secure shop where she can sell clothing.

What she likes most about her community bank is the ease of the loan and the advice they give.

loans.use: Purchase more inputs for her business selling candy.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
Raquel es socia del Banco Comunal “Gran Poder”, ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 35 años de edad, de estado civil casada y con  dos hijos, tiene grado de instrucción primaria completa.
La señora, tiene negocio de venta de computadoras, accesorios, y otros,  no solo eso sino también se dedica a la compra y venta de autos. Ella viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace seis años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, el cual invirtió en la librería que en aquellos años ella se dedicaba, paulatinamente su capital fue incrementando, hasta que decidió cambiar de negocio, todo esto gracias al Movimiento Manuela Ramos.
La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 3000.00 Nuevos soles, préstamo que le permitirá aumentar la mercadería de su negocio.
Su sueño es seguir con el mismo negocio, pero siempre crecer cada vez más. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es compartir la alegría en conjunto.
texts.en:
Raquel is a member of the "Gran Poder" community bank, located in the Ilave district, in the El Collao province, in the Puno department. She is 35 years old, is married with two children. She finished elementary school.

She owns a business selling computers, accessories and other items. Additionally, she is also dedicated to purchasing and selling cars. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for six years. The first loan requested was for 300 new soles which was invested in the bookstore, to which, in those years, she was dedicated. Gradually, her capital was increasing, until she decided to change her business... all thanks to the Manuela Ramos Movement.

She will request a new loan of 3,000 new soles, which will allow her to increase her business' merchandise. Her dream is to continue with the same business but always grow more each time. What she likes about her community bank is sharing happiness.

loans.use: Increase the merchandise of her business.

loans.name: Sandy Elizabeth

texts.es:
Sandy es socia del Banco Comunal “Santiago Patrón”, ubicado en el distrito Santiago de Pupuja, provincia de Azángaro, departamento de Puno, tiene 23 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y no tiene hijos, la señora tiene estudios de educación superior completa.

Sandy viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 3 años, con un préstamo de S/.  300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital de  su negocio de venta de frutas y verduras.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 3000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le servirá para comprar insumos como: arroz, harina, frutas y verduras para venderlas.
	
Su sueño es poner una pollería en Puerto Maldonado.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la reunión para conversar y la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Sandy is a member of the “Santiago Patrón” Communal Bank, which is located in the Santiago de Pupuja district of Azángaro province, in the Puno region of Peru. She is 23 years old, has a live-in partner and does not have any children. She has a post-secondary education.
Sandy started working with the Manuela Ramos Movement 3 years ago with a loan of 300 Nuevos Soles, which she used to increase working capital for her fruit and vegetable business.
She is requesting a new loan of 3000 Nuevos Soles to buy products like rice, flour, fruits and vegetables to sell.
Her dream is to set up a poultry shop in Puerto Maldonado.
Her favourite things about her communal bank are the talking in the meetings and the punctuality.

loans.use: Purchase of rice, flour, fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Silveria

texts.es:
Silveria es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Activas II”, ubicado en el distrito de Juliaca, provincia San Román, departamento de Puno, tiene 42 años de edad, de estado civil soltera y tiene 01 hijo independiente, la señora estudió hasta 4to de educación secundaria.

Silveria viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 06 meses,  nos cuenta que su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio venta de pescado.

La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito  S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en su negocio venta de pescados y papas.
	
Su sueño es tener más capital para su negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las reuniones y el ahorro.
texts.en:
Silveria is a member of the “Mujeres Activas II” Communal Bank, which is located in the Juliaca district of San Román province, in the Puno region of Peru. She is 42 years old, single and has one adult child. She has completed 4 years of secondary school.
Silveria has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for 6 months. She tells us that she first received a 500 PEN loan, which she used to increase working capital for her business selling fish.
She is requesting a new 800 PEN loan to invest in selling fish and potatoes.
Her dream is to have more capital for her business.
Her favourite things about her communal bank are the meetings and the savings.

loans.use: Invest in selling fish and potatoes

loans.name: Sonia Vilma

texts.es:
Sonia es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón de Jesús”  ubicado en el distrito Juliaca, provincia San Román, departamento de Puno, tiene 30 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 03 hijos, la señora estudió hasta 2do de educación secundaria.

Sonia viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 01 año, el primer solicitado fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de artesanía.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le servirá para comprar materiales para su negocio de venta de artesanía.
	
Su sueño es abrir una empresa de artesanía.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones y las charlas.
texts.en:
Sonia is a member of the “Corazón de Jesús” Communal Bank, which is located in the Juliaca district of San Román province, in the Puno region of Peru. She is 30 years old, married and has 3 children. She completed 2 years of secondary school.
Sonia has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for 1 year. She first received a 500 PEN loan, which she used to increase working capital for her artisan business.
She is requesting a new 1000 PEN loan to buy materials for her business.
Her dream is to open a company selling artisan goods.
Her favourite things about her communal bank are the meetings and the conversation.

loans.use: Purchase of materials for her artisan business

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda es socia del Banco Comunal “Gran Poder”, ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 29 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente con tres hijos, tiene estudios de educación primaria completa.
Yolanda viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 9 años, el primer préstamo fue de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, el cual le sirvió para comprar insumos para preparar jugo de quinua.
La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/ 800.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le servirá para la compra de insumos en su negocio.
 Su sueño es tener además de la venta de jugo, una tienda de venta de pollos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es compartir la alegría.
texts.en:
Yolanda is a member of the “Gran Poder” (Great Power) Communal Bank.  It is located in the Ilave district, El Collao province, Puno department.  She is 29 years old, and she has a live-in partner.  She has three children, and she has an elementary school education.

Yolanda has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for nine years.  Her first loan was for 300 soles, which she used to buy ingredients to make quinoa juice.

She is requesting a new loan for 800 soles, which she will use to buy supplies for her business.

Her dream is to have a store selling chickens in addition to her business of selling juice.

What she likes about her communal bank is sharing the joy.

loans.use: Buy ingredients to prepare quinoa juice

loans.name: Jose Leonel

texts.es: José Leonel tiene 44 años, es casado y reside junto a su esposa y a sus 3 hijos en el barrio la Concepción. Se dedica a la comercialización de cosméticos, hace más de 11 años pues fue con recursos propios que empezó este medio de vida. Esta actividad es su principal fuente ingreso por lo que trata de mantenerla del mejor modo posible. José desea adquirir más productos para ampliar su negocio y aumentar el número de ventas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez un crédito para la compra de lápiz labial, polvos, cremas entre otras cosas. El es una persona tranquila y bastante emprendedora. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario para mejorar gradualmente la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
José Leonel is 44 years old, and he is married.  He lives with his wife and their three children in the La Concepción neighborhood.

He has been selling cosmetics for over 11 years.  He started this way of earning a living with his own resources.  This business is his main source of income.  Therefore, he tries to maintain it in the best possible way.

José wishes to get more products in order to expand his business and increase sales.  That is why he believes it is advisable to request a loan for the first time.  He will use the loan to buy lipstick, powder, and creams, among other things.

He is a level-headed and very enterprising person.  His greatest desire is to keep growing as a businessman in order to gradually improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos tiene 67 años, es separado y vive en su casa propia en compañía de su único hijo, quien es mayor edad. Juntos forjaron su propio negocio. La especialidad de Santos, es reparar calzados, por ello cuenta un espacio apropiado dentro de su casa, en lo que lo ha convertido en un taller. Es ahí donde cose  los quiebres de los zapatos, así como cambiar  tacos y suelas. Sus clientes se encuentran satisfechos por el trabajo que realiza, es así que ha logrado tener 40 años trabajando en esta actividad, por lo que empezó aprendiendo de sus padres. Lo que más le gusta de su oficio es la comunicación y el trato que tiene con sus clientes, además que gracias a este trabajo puede generarse buenas ingresos económicos a su hogar. Con el tiempo, desea ampliar  y mejorar su taller, por ello se ha propuesto comprar otras maquinas mas sofisticadas, para lograr mayor eficiencia en el acabado de los calzados que fabrica. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP y se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Con el crédito que solicita, piensa comprar suelas, cueros e incluso enviará a reparar su maquina cortadora de suelas.
texts.en: Santos is 67 years old, separated, and lives in his own house with his only son, who is an adult. Together, they formed their own business. Santos's specialty is shoe repair, which he carries out in an appropriated space in his house he converted into a workshop. That is where he sews rips in shoes, and replaces heels and soles. His clients are satisfied with his work, and this is how he has made it in this business, which he learned from his parents, for 40 years. What he likes most about his job is the communication and good treatment that he has with his clients. Also, thanks to this work he can generate a good wage. With time, he wishes to expand and improve his workshop. He has proposed buying more sophisticated machines to achieve greater efficiency in finishing his shoes. This is his second loan with MFP and he promises to make his payments on time. With this loan, he will buy soles, leather and send his sole-cutting machine for repair.

loans.use: Purchase leather and soles, and repair sole-cutting machine

loans.name: Virgilia Edith

texts.en:
Virgilia is a member of the Communal Bank "Pink Women," located in the district of Ilave, in the province of El Collao and the department of Puno. She is 22 years old, single, and has no children. She has a secondary school education. 

Virgilia has worked with Manuela Ramos for four years. She buys and sells small animals (rams and pigs).  Her first loan was for 300 PEN, and she used the money to increase the working capital for her business. 

She is now asking for a loan for 500 PEN for additional investment in her business.  Manuela dreams of having a grocery store one day.  What she likes most about the Communal Bank is the group work.

loans.use: To invest in her business of buying and selling small animals

loans.name: Elias Richard

texts.es:
El señor  Richard tiene 30 años de edad vive en la zona sud de la ciudad de Cochabamba  en la avenida Suecia, el es soltero y vive con su abuela y con sus hermanos menores, el trabaja como radiotaxi en la empresa Troya en nuestra ciudad ya como cuatro años.

Richard es una persona que sufrió mucho desde niño al ser el mayor de su familia ya que cuando él era niño su padre falleció con la enfermedad de Cirrosis, se que do la madre sola con la cuatro niños pequeños  a los cuales los abandono con  la abuela y ella se fue con otro hombre a otra ciudad, desde ese momento la abuela fue la que los saco adelante y Richard junto con ella lucho todos los días hasta que el más pequeño terminara el colegio, el tuvo que trabajar desde muy joven y al mismo tiempo estudiar y culminar el colegio por las noches su abuela siempre estuvo con el apoyándolo y ayudando a sus otros hermanos. 

El se dedica aun a trabajar y estudiar ya que ahora está estudiando Contabilidad en un instituto, el solicita el crédito para poder comprar un tanque de gas para su vehículo y  así de esa manera poder seguir con sus sueños y seguir ayudando a sus hermanos y su abuela la cual para el ella es la persona más importante de su vida por ser su madre no la que le dio la vida si no por criarlo y estar en los momentos buenos y malos con sus hermanos.
Richard en un futuro quiere tener una ferretería y ser mejor en la vida.
texts.en:
Richard is 30 years old and lives in the southern part of Cochabamba on Suecia Avenue.  He is single and lives with his grandmother and his younger brothers.  He has worked as a taxi driver for the Troya company in Cochabamba for the last 4 years.

Richard has had a difficult life since he was young; he is the oldest child in the family and when he was a child, his father died of cirrhosis, leaving his mother alone with four small children.  She abandoned the children with the grandmother and left to live with another man in another city.  From that moment on, the grandmother took responsibility for the children and helped them to make something of their lives.  Richard worked with her day by day until the youngest child finished high school.  He had to work from the time he was very young while studying to finish high school at night.  His grandmother was always there supporting him and helping his siblings.

He still works and studies at the same time; now he is studying accounting at an institute; he is seeking this loan to buy a gas tank for his car to keep working towards his dreams and helping his siblings and his grandmother.  She is the most important person in his life as she is really his mother, not by birth, but she was the one who raised him and was there with him in the good times and the bad.

Richard would like to run a hardware store in the future and improve his life.

loans.use: Working capital: buy a gas tank for his car

loans.name: Mujeres Del Universo Sf Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Mujeres del Universo SF. Está ubicado en San Martin Texmelucan en el Estado D. Puebla  El grupo está conformado por 10 integrantes. Anabel S.R es la presidente del grupo. Tiene 45 años, no estudio pero tiene su negocio D. venta D. ganado.  Ella se dedica a comprar y acabar D. criar borregos, vacas y chivos, los venD. en diferentes poblaciones desD. hace 15 años. Solicita el préstamo para compra D. otros borregos y alimento. Sus clientes son el público en general.  Al momento D. solicitar este préstamo se siente entusiasmada con muchas ganas D. sobresalir. Quiere este crédito para la compra D. alimento y otros borregos ya que debe D. tener en buen estado a sus animales para ofrecer ganado D. calidad.
texts.en: This group is called Mujeres del Universo SF. It's located in San Martin Texmelucan in the state of Puebla. The group consists of 10 members. Anabel S.R. is the president of the group. She is 45 years old and has no education, but has a business selling livestock. She works buying and raising sheep, cows, and goats. She has sold them in various areas for 15 years. She is seeking this loan to purchase more sheep and food. Her clients are the general public. In applying for this loan she feels very enthusiastic and is eager to succeed. She wants to buy sheep and food because she needs to have animals in good condition in order to sell high quality livestock.

loans.use: Purchase sheep and food

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is a member of the Communal Bank group "Pink Women," located in the district of Ilave, in the province of El Collao, and the department of Puno. She is 26 years old, single and has no children. She has a secondary school education.

Vilma has worked with Manuela Ramos for four years. Her first loan was for the amount of 300 PEN, to buy and fatten small animals, including pigs and chickens. Two years ago, she opened a grocery store, with the help of the first loan. 

She is now asking for a loan of 1,500 PEN, to purchase more products for her grocery selling business. 

Her dream is to open another store in a nearby city, filled with products, and to buy herself a vehicle.  What she likes about the Communal Bank is the group work.

loans.use: The purchase of more products for her business selling groceries

loans.name: Fortuna Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento FORTUNA esta integrado por personas que viven en la zona de Bajo Alpacoma, esta zona se caracteriza porque alberga a más de cincuenta fábricas de ladrillos artesanales, la mayoría de las socias trabajan como maquinistas, cargadoras o quemadoras en estas fábricas, además tienen actividades como la cría de cerdos y gallinas. Venta de comida y venta de ropa, la líder de este grupo y la encargada de conformarlo es la señora Victoria quien trabaja en una fábrica quemando ladrillos, ella vive sola con sus cuatro hijos en su casa propia que con mucho esfuerzo la construyó, la Sra. Utilizara el dinero del crédito en la compra de material de construcción para hacer terminar su cocina,   la Sra. María es la tesorera del Banco de Emprendimiento tiene una pensión donde atiende en su mayoría a los obreros de estas fábricas, el dinero lo utilizara en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus platillos, la Sra.  Adela se dedica a la venta de ropa esporádicamente de manera ambulante, su esposo es maquinista en una de estas fábricas. El trabajo que realizan las señoras y sus esposos es de mucho esfuerzo puesto que hay días que tienen que permanecer despiertos hasta dos noches para quemar los ladrillos. La mayoría de estas socias trabajan solo con la institución.
texts.en: The Fortuna Entrepreneurial Bank is made up of people who live in the Bajo Alpacoma region.  This region is known for having more than 50 artisanal brick factories.  Most of the members of the bank work as machinists, brick carriers or brick bakers in the factories.  They also have small businesses that they run outside of the factories like raising pigs or chickens, selling food or clothing.  The group leader who helped to found the group is Victoria who works in the factory baking bricks.  She lives alone with her 4 children in her own home which she built thanks to her own hard work.  She will use the money from the loan to buy construction materials to finish building her kitchen.  Maria is the bank's treasurer and provides food to the majority of the factory workers.  She will use the money to buy ingredients for her food.  Adela works selling clothing around town.  Her husband is a machinist in a factory.  The women and their husbands work very hard as there are often days where they have to stay awake 2 nights in a row to bake the bricks.  Most of the women work only with the institution.

loans.use: Buy construction material

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
El señor Sergio S. tiene 28 años, vive en la zona de Mallco Rancho – Sipe Sipe, provincia Quillacollo del departamento de Cochabamba.

El señor S. es una persona sencilla y humilde, ha estudiado hasta el bachillerato pero no ha podido continuar sus estudios por su situación económica, es soltero y espera en un futuro mejorar su situación económica. 
El se dedica a la agricultura y también como ayudante de albañil.

Produce alimentos en pequeña cantidad porque no tiene suficiente agua para sembrar mas plantas. Es por esta razón que ha tenido que buscar otra ocupación para poder mantenerse. 

Todavía sigue cultivando anualmente, pero tiene el objetivo de cambiar esta situación   asegurándose de tener suficiente agua para usarla en la agricultura. 

Es por esta razón que ha solicitado un crédito para ser socio de un pozo de agua que le permita regar sus plantas y mejorar su economía.
texts.en:
Sergio S. is 28 years old and lives in the Malico Rancho - Sipe Sipe region in the province of Quillacollo in Cochabamba, Bolivia.

S. is a very simple, humble man.  He studied through his bachelor's degree but could not continue his studies because of his economic situation; he is single and he hopes to improve his financial situation in the future.

He works in agriculture and as a construction assistant.

He does not produce a lot of crops because he doesn't have enough water to irrigate his plants.  This is why he has looked for other work to support himself. 

He still cultivates his crops each year but he would like to change this situation by assuring himself of enough water to irrigate his plants.

This is why he is seeking a loan to buy shares of a water well which will allow him to irrigate his plants and improve his income.

loans.use: Buy shares in a water well for irrigation

loans.name: Fiorella Patricia

texts.es:
La Sra. H. G. Fiorella Patricia no tiene carga familiar y vive con su madre. 
Se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y además también trabaja en una botica de un hospital. Cuenta con un negocio en su mismo domicilio, el cual tiene afluencia de público.
Solicita el préstamo para invertir en su negocio para la campaña navideña.
texts.en:
H. G. Fiorella Patricia is single without children and lives with her mother.

She works selling beauty products and also works in a pharmacy in a hospital.  She runs her beauty products business out of her home with a storefront that is open to the public.

She is seeking a loan to invest in her business for the Christmas season.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Nury Alejandra

texts.en:
Nury is a member of the Communal Bank group "Great Power," located in the district of Ilave, in the province of Collao, and the department of Puno. She is 47 years old and is a single mother of one child. She has not completed her higher education. 

Nury has worked with Manuela Ramos for five years. The first loan she got was for 500 PEN to increase the merchandise in her business, which is selling wine, coca, sweets, and other products. It is a business that varies according to the season.  During Christmas she sells fireworks, chocolates, wine, cake, and other things.  During Carnaval, Mother's Day, and national festivals, she also sells other types of products.

She is currently asking for a new loan of 2,500 PEN, to invest in her business.  Her dream is to have a business filled with products, and for her son to know his father. 

Her favorite thing about the Communal Bank is the unity.

loans.use: Invest in her business selling wine, coca, and other products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase feed for her livestock, soy, and working capital

loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.es: Bonifacia es una madre de familia de 43 años que reside junto a su esposo y a sus 3 hijos en el barrio las colinas. Se dedica desde hace más de cinco años a la compra y venta de ganado, leña y leche. Ella se dedica a estos animales en que están situados en su domicilio, cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a sus vecinos y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde vive. Con los ingresos que ella percibe de esta actividad de encarga de ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia. Bonifacia desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más animales y de alimento balanceado con los cuales espera aumentar sus ventas y percibir mayor número de ganancias, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez. Con este dinero planea seguir creciendo como empresaria y seguir ayudando a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía. En la zona ella es una mujer bastante respetada y estimada por sus vecinos y conocidos.
texts.en: Bonifacia is a 43-year-old mother who lives with her husband and their three children in the neighborhood of Las Colinas. For more than five years she has works buying and selling livestock, firewood, and milk. She tends these animals at home, and when they reach a good level of development, she sells them to her neighbors and business people who visit her neighborhood. The earnings she gets from this activity are used to help her husband in sustaining the family. Bonifacia wants to expand her business by purchasing more animals and balanced food. She hopes this will increase her sales and bring her a better wage, so she is applying for a loan for the first time. With this loan, she plans to continue growing as a businesswoman and keep supporting her family. In this area, she is a well respected and esteemed woman among her neighbors and acquaintances.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Angel

texts.es:
El señor Ángel P. G. tiene 42 años casados con la Señora María Sonia Olivera Villarroel mas de  6 años, tienen 3 hijos menores dependientes que estudian en nivel primaria, en la escuela rural de la comunidad, actividad principal es la agricultura produce papaliza, papa, haba en 2 hectáreas en la comunidad de Toncoli 2, tienen 2 cabezas de ganado vacuno que utiliza en las faenas agrícolas,  son de familia humilde de pocos recursos pero muy trabajadores, están a 55 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba para ellos  acudir a los bancos para un préstamo de dinero es muy difícil.  

Se tuvo la iniciativa de ir a esta zona rural. donde Don Ángel P. G. necesitaba dinero para comprar abono orgánico, semilla de papa para la siembra de este año, don Ángel nos comenta que la producción agrícola en este año ha sido poco por factores climáticos como la sequia, si este año no siembra no tendría alimentación ni dinero tampoco ahorro para mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Ángel P. G. is 42 years old. He has been married to Mrs. María Sonia Olivera Villarroel for more than 6 years. They have three minor dependent children who are in primary school at the rural community school.  His main activity is agriculture. He grows papaliza, potatoes and beans on 2 hectares in the community of Toncoli 2. They have 2 heads of cattle that they use for agricultural work. They are a humble family of few resources but very hardworking. They are 55 km from the city of Cochabamba. For them, going to a bank for a money loan is very difficult.  

There was an initiative to go to this rural area where Ángel P. G. needed money to buy organic fertilizer and potato seed for this year's planting. Angel tells us that the agricutural production for this year has been low due to waether factors such as drought. If he doesn't plant this year, he won't have food or money to support his family.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizer and potato seed

loans.name: Laura

texts.en:
When Laura M.’ children were old enough to go to school, Laura was ready to begin working and start her own tortilla-making business. Laura and her husband started La Milpa Tortilleria in 1998 and they have since hired two employees, bought a house and put two children through college. 

This is Laura’s third loan with ACCION Texas-Louisiana. Her first two loans were for machinery and capital. She plans on opening another location with this loan and buying all the necessary equipment to stock the new space. Before Laura found ACCION, she tried desperately to access credit through banks and even tried to refinance her home. Now, she has successfully repaid two ACCION loans, each of which contributed significantly to the growth of La Milpa. Laura’s advice to people who want to start their own businesses is, “Go for it! Starting a business is not an easy task. You have to persevere, do your best, and never give up. It is a hard process and you sacrifice a lot but it is well worth it if it helps you provide a better future for you and your family.”

loans.use: To open a second location and buy machinery to make tortillas

loans.name: Sonia Roxana

texts.es:
La Sra A. D. Q. Sonia Roxana cuenta con una pequeña bodega en su domicilio desD. el mes D. marzo del 2009 hasta la actualidad. Asímismo se dedica también a la venta D. cerveza y D. comida en las quincenas D. cada mes. 
Cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra D. mercadería y D. un exhibidor para mostrar los productos que ofrece en su negocio.
Tiene buenas referencias personales por parte D. los vecinos y tiene deseos D. superación para asi obtener una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Sonia Roxana A. D. Q. has had a small store in her home from March 2009 to the present. She also works selling beer and food every two weeks.

She is requesting the loan for the purchase of merchandise and a showcase to show the products that she sells in her business.

She has good personal references from her neighbors, as well as professional references, and has the desire to succeed so that she has a better quality of life.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Telesfora

texts.en:
Telesfora is a member of the Communal Bank group "Pink Women", located in the district of Ilave, in the province of El Collao, and in the department of Puno. She is 58 years old and married with seven children. She has no formal education.

Telesfora has worked with Manuela Ramos for four years. Her first loan in the amount of 300 PEN allowed her to fatten small animals such as sheep and pigs. 

She is now asking for a loan of 500 PEN to increase the capital of her business so she can fattening sheep and to breed pigs. 

Her dream is to grow her business and to see her children secure jobs. What she likes about the Communal Bank is working in a group with joy.

loans.use: Increasing in her business of fattening livestock (sheep) and breeding pigs

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La señora A. H. Margarita tiene 49 años de edad y vive en una casa de propiedad de su madre vivienda que esta ubicada en un barrio de la ciudad de Tarija.  Margarita es soltera y no tiene hijos. Margarita se dedica a la actividad de la elaboracion de masas las cuales entrega en los diferentes establecimientos de la ciudad. Actividad que viene realizando desde hace mas de 20 años.                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Margarita nos dice que como se esta acercando la festividad de los difuntos tiene la necesidad de comprar harina, manteca, azucar, etc. Tambien comprar mercaderia para su tienda de barrio que ella tiene. De esa  forma mejorar sus ingresos para brindarles una mejor vida a su madre,  es por eso que el credito sera destinado para la compra de dichos insumos y mercaderia .                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Margarita nos cuenta que quiere darle a su madre toda la comodidad que pueda, por eso nos dice que el proximo credito que solicite sera para mejorar las condiciones de su casa donde vive ella y su madre.
texts.en:
Margarita A. H. is 49 years old and lives in her mother’s house, located in a neighborhood of the city of Tarija. Margarita is single and does not have children. She works making pastries which she then distributes to the different establishments in the city, and has done so for more than 20 years.

Margarita tells us that as the Day of the Dead is approaching, she needs to buy flour, butter, sugar, etc. She also needs to buy merchandise for her neighborhood store so that she can improve her earnings and provide her mother with a better life. This is why the loan will be used for the purchase of the mentioned supplies and merchandise.

Margarita tells us that she wants to give her mother all the comfort that she can. This is why she says that the next loan that she requests will be for making improvements to the house where she and her mother live.

loans.use: Operational capital

loans.name: Veronika Katerina

texts.en:
Veronika is a member of the Communal Bank group "Active Women II," located in the district of Juliaca, in the province of San Román, and in the department of Puno. She is 20 years old, single and has no children.  She is currently seeking a higher education degree. 

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan was for the amount of 500 PEN, to increase the capital for her selling clothes business. 

Veronika is currently asking for a new loan for 800 PEN, to purchase more merchandise to sell. 

Her dream is to be a professional and to have a piñata store.  What she likes about the Communal Bank is the terms of the loan and the responsibility.

loans.use: The purchase of additional merchandise for her business selling clothing

loans.name: Sussy Nataly

texts.en:
Susy is a member of the Communal Bank group "Great Power", located in the district of Ilave, in the province of El Collao, and in the department of Puno. She is 30 years old and in a common law marriage, with one child. She has a higher education degree. 

Susy has worked with Manuela Ramos for two years. The first loan she got was for 300 PEN, to purchase more products for her business selling spare parts. 

She is now asking for a loan of 2,400 PEN, to open a new store selling cellular phones.  Her dream is to have a bigger business.

What she likes about the Communal Bank is that it allows her to have her savings.

loans.use: Opening a new store that sells cellular phones

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
El señor Luis Q. C., vive en la zona de Jaihuaico del departamento de Cochabamba.
Esta casado y tiene 2 hijos. Es una persona sencilla y trabajadora, con mucho esfuerzo a logrado que sus hijos hayan terminado el bachillerato y espera poder colaborarles para que continúen estudios universitarios.
Su principal actividad es la confección de calzados y tiene una pequeña empresa donde trabaja su esposa y uno de sus hijos. Dependiendo de la temporada y pedidos también contrata personal eventual que a veces llega a 4 personas.

Considera que los meses donde más ingresos tiene es fin de año y quiere para esta época tener materia prima en mayor cantidad para ofertar y cumplir con sus clientes. Porque años anteriores no ha podido cubrir la demanda y ha perdido muchas oportunidades. 

Es por esta razón que ha solicitado un crédito para comprar materia prima que le permita afrontar con éxito las ventas de fin de año.
texts.en:
Luis Q. C. lives in the Jaihuaico area of the department of Cochabamba, and is married with two children. He is a simple and hardworking person and with a great deal of effort, he has made sure that his children finished high school and he hopes that they will continue with college.

His main business is shoe making and he has a small business where his wife and one of his children work. Depending on the season and the orders, he also hires sometimes up to four temporary staff.

He considers the months in which he earns the most to be at the end of the year. This is why he wants to have a larger quantity of raw material for this season to sell and fill his customers’ orders because he has not be able to meet the demand and has lost many opportunities in previous years.

For this reason, he has requested a loan to purchase raw material that will allow him to successfully face the end-of-year sales.

loans.use: Raw material for operational capital

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is a member of the Communal Bank "Miraflores", located in the district of pilcuyo, in the province of Ilave, and the department of El Collao. She is 33 years old, and married with three children. She has a secondary school education. 

Vilma has a bakery. She has worked with Manuela Ramos for two years. Her first loan was for the amount of 300 PEN, to buy consumables for her business, such as flour, lard, and yeast, to make bread. 

She is now asking for a loan for 500 PEN, to buy consumables such as lard and yeast.  Her dream is to grow her business. What she likes most about the Communal Bank is sharing the happiness.

loans.use: The purchase of consumables such as lard and yeast to make bread

loans.name: Flor De Tulipanes Group

texts.es:
La  A.C. FLOR DE TULIPAN  inicia su ciclo Nº 1 en el Centro Focal de Cascada, de esta asociación podríamos decir que tiene muchas expectativas con respecto al crédito.  Esta asociación está compuesta por nueve integrantes, ocho mujeres y un varón. La mesa directiva tiene a la cabeza a la señora Ana como presidenta.

La señora  Ana es una mujer de 40  años de edad, casada, madre de cuatro niños. Este es su primer ciclo en esta asociación, comenta que hace seis años también participó en otro grupo en el Centro Focal de Cascada, sin embargo ahora se constituye en un reto asumir el cargo de presidenta.
  
Desde hace cuatro años trabaja en el tejido de mantas en telar, con lana de vicuña, le enseño su cuñada.  El crédito solicitado de Bs. 1000.- le serviría para la compra de vellón de lana de vicuña, el mismo que será hilado y se transformará en una manta.  El trabajo va más allá, ella tiene el apoyo de una señora que hace el macramé de las mantas.
 Con respecto a los negocios  que llevan adelante el resto de integrantes de la asociación, ellos tienen negocios como: tejido de mantas y chompas, tienda surtida, criadero de chanchos y pollos, venta de mandiles, venta de comida, tejido de camas, tejido de mantas de vicuñas, tejido de macramé en bolsas.
texts.en:
The “Flor de Tulipan” (Tulip Flower) Communal Bank is starting its first cycle in the Cascada Community Center.  We could say that the group has a lot of expectations regarding the loan.  This group is comprised of nine members, eight women and one man.  The head of the board of directors is Ana, the president.

Ana, age 40, is married and has four children.  This is her first cycle with this group.  She says that six years ago she participated as a member of another group in the Cascada Community Center.  Now her challenge is taking on the responsibility of being the president.

She has worked on a loom weaving blankets of vicuña wool for four years.  Her sister-in-law taught her.  The 1,000 Bs. loan that she requested is to buy vicuña wool fleece.  It will be spun and transformed into a blanket.  The work goes further.  She has help from a woman who makes macramé for the blankets.

Regarding the ongoing businesses of the rest of the group’s members, they have businesses like:  weaving blankets and sweaters, a stocked store, raising pigs and chickens, selling aprons, selling food, weaving bedding, weaving vicuña blankets, and weaving macramé bags.

loans.use: Buy wool for a loom

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Francisco V. M. tiene 42 años de edad y vive en su casa de propia, vivienda que está ubicada en una comunidad de la ciudad de Tarija.  Francisco  es casado tiene dos hijos dependiente de sus ingresos. Francisco se dedica al servicio de transporte libre de pasajeros como taxista esta actividad la viene desarrollando desde hace mas de 20 años, además se dedica a la agricultura, sembrando frutas como la uva y muy poco de papa pues su costo es mas elevado.

Francisco tiene la necesidad de comprar semillas de papa para sembrar en el terreno que hace poco tiempo compro, de esa forma mejorar sus ingresos para brindarles una mejor vida a su esposa e hijos, es por eso que el crédito será destinado para la compra de dichas semillas.
 
Francisco nos cuenta que quiere darle a su esposa e hijos toda la comodidad que pueda, por eso nos dice que el próximo crédito que solicite será para mejorar las condiciones de su casa donde vive.
texts.en:
Sr. Francisco V. M. is 42 years old and lives in his own home located in a community of the city of Tarija.  He is married to Sra. Marina Janeth Altamirano Sandoval and they have two children.  Francisco works as a teacher in the rural areas and provides free transportation as a taxi driver in his spare time.  He has worked at both jobs for more than 20 years.  In addition, he is a farmer who grows fruits, such as grapes, and a few potatoes since the cost of cultivating them is more expensive.

Francisco needs to buy potato seedlings to plant on the plot of land he recently purchased.  This will help him improve his income so that he can provide a better life for his wife and children.  The loan will be used for the purpose of acquiring the potato seedlings.

Francisco says that he wants to provide his wife and children all the comforts that he can.  He says that with the next loan he requests, he plans to make improvements to his home.

loans.use: Purchase potato seedlings

loans.name: Gladys Maria

texts.es: La señora Gladys Maria se dedica a  la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 8 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que ha sido muy difícil mantener este negocio. El objetivo de ella es invertir el crédito directamente en el negocio, sus inicios se dan por  ya que surgió como una alternativa de trabajo para ella y su familia ya que además tiene que mantener a sus 2 hijos que están a cargo. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de materia como sabanas, faldas, vestidos, trajes y calzado. Sueña con aumentar su mercadería para obtener una gran variedad de clientes. Ella siempre ha sido muy responsable con sus cuotas de pagos pues no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos y esta pendiente de lo que sus clientes le solicitan.
texts.en: Gladys Maria works selling general merchandise. She has had this business for more than eight years, and it has been difficult to maintain. Her objective is to invest the credit directly into the business, which emerged as an alternative job for her and her family. She also has to maintain the two children in her care. The loan is to buy things like sheets, skirts, dresses, suits, and shoes. She dreams of augmenting her merchandise to obtain a greater variety of customers. She has always been very responsible with her payments, as this is not her first time applying for loans and they are necessary to meet her customers' needs.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Placida

texts.es:
La solicitante señora Placida P. D. V., es una persona mayor , casada con una hija dependiente D. ella D. 18 años-estudiante, con su actividad ha mejorado sus condiciones  D. vida y ha educado a sus hijos sin buscar otro empleo fuera D. la casa.  

La zona donD. trabaja y vive  es una zona lechera, a ocho kilómetros D. la ciudad, su casa es propia y para esta epoca no hay pastos (sequía muy fuerte en todas las zonas), le han faltado recursos para comprar forrajes (cáscara D. soya).  Ella elabora quesillos con la leche que produce. D. este modo continuara manteniendo a su hija y lograr que ella termine sus estudios, es uno D. sus máximos sueños.
texts.en:
Sra. Placida P. D. V. is an older individual who is married and has an 18 year old daughter who is a student and a dependent. Through her business, Placida is able to improve her living conditions and proviD. her children with an education without having to seek work outsiD. of the home.

The area where she lives and works is known for being a dairy producing region, located eight kilometers outsiD. of the city. Placida owns her home. This season has resulted in no grasses due to a strong drought that has impacted the entire area. She lacks the resources to buy fodder, specifically soybean husks. Placida makes cheese with the milk her cows produce in order to continue supporting her daughter and helping her finish her studies, which is one of her greatest dreams.

loans.use: Purchase fodder for her dairy cows

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es:
La señora Valentina tiene 43 años, está separada de su marido hace 10 años aproximadamente, ya que este es un alcohólico y lo único que hacía es maltratarla y pedirle dinero para comprar su bebida, entonces ella decidió separarse, juntos tienen 4 hijos de (21, 19,17 y 10) años   de los cuales se hizo cargo la señora Valentina, el hijo mayor se encuentra en la Republica de Argentina trabajando, las otras tres hijas están estudiando.
Doña Valentina vive en la ciudad de Cochabamba en la comunidad de Esquilan Chico, su principal actividad económica es la producción de la leche cruda, cuyo producto entrega a una empresa que se dedica a la elaboración de productos lácteos.

El préstamo será destinado para la compra de una cabeza de ganado lechero y de esta manera incrementar la producción de la leche, y así seguir creciendo en su actividad generando más ingresos.

Entre sus sueños y metas de la señora Valentina es que sus tres hijas puedan terminar de estudiar y tener una carrera profesional y de esa manera puedan tener un mejor nivel de vida, que el hijo mayor pueda volver de Argentina y realizar alguna actividad económica junto a su madre.
texts.en:
Sra. Valentina is 43 years old and has been separated from her husband for approximately ten years because he is an alcoholic. Since he was being abusive and using money to buy liquor, she decided to separate. Valentina has four children (ages 21, 19, 17, and 10) for whom she is reponsible. Her eldest son is currently in Argentina working while her three daughters are in school.

Doña Valentina lives in the community of Esquilan Chico in the city of Cochabamba. Her main business activity is raw milk production. She sells her output to a company that makes dairy products.

This loan will be used to buy a dairy cow so that she can increase her milk production. This will help keep her business growing so that she can generate more income.

loans.use: Purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Armando

texts.es:
El señor Armando C. O. vive en la comunidad Boquerón alto de la Provincia Tiraque del Departamento Cochabamba.

La actividad principal de Armando C. es la agricultura que trabaja con su familia en algunos casos con ayuda de sus vecinos, es una familia humilde con tres hijos y están en la escuela en su comunidad.

El crédito que está solicitando es para los insumos agrícolas abono de gallinaza y semilla de papa, el señor armando piensa mejorar sus ingresos los próximos años en su actividad agrícola
texts.en:
Sr. Armando C. O. lives in the community of Boquerón Alto in Tiraque Province, Department of Cochabamba.

He is a farmer by trade and works with his family, but occasionally he will receive assistance from his neighbors. His humble family includes his three children who attend school in the community.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy farming supplies, chicken manure (to use as fertilizer), and potato seedlings. Sr. Armando plans to improve his income in the following years through his farming activities.

loans.use: Purchase farming supplies, fertilizer, and potato seedings

loans.name: Rosendo Vicente

texts.es:
El señor Rosendo Vicente G. A. se dedica a brindar servicios de transporte en mototaxi la cual es propia.
El solicitante vive en casa familiar conjuntamente con su esposa y sus menores hijos, su esposa se dedica a vender productos de belleza de esa forma ayuda con la canasta familiar. Está solicitando el crédito para el mantenimiento de su mototaxi , se le otorgará el préstamo por presentar buenas referencias personales y también por tener buen rendimiento crediticio.
texts.en:
Sr. Rosendo Vicente G. A. provides transportation services using his own motorcycle taxi. He lives at home with his family, which consists of his wife and young children. His wife sells beauty products to help meet the family needs.

The loan he is requesting will be used for maintenance of his motorcycle taxi. This loan is being granted to Rosendo because he has good personal references and a good credit history.

loans.use: Vehicle maintenance

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: TO BUY A CALF TO RAISE

loans.name: Ssebastian

texts.es:
Don Sebastian  de 37 años de edad, labora como docente de primaria en la colonia la Fonseca desde hace 16 años desempeñandose con gran responsabilidad y honestidad, tiene 2 niños de 12 y 15 años de edad, ambos estudian su primaria y secundaria, su esposa se encarga de realizar los quehaceres del hogar y del cuido de sus hijos, don Sebastian actualmente està estudiando en la Universidad para asi lograr obtener su titulo de licenciatura en ciencias de la Educaciòn y ejercer su profesion con mayor eficiencia. 

Solicita su 4to crèdito para  construir una habitaciòn para su hija mayor ya que necesita mas privecidad,  

Su mayor sueños en la vida es que su hijos estudien y crezcan en un ambiente sano y que no les haga falta nada.
texts.en:
Don Sebastian is 37 years old. He has worked with great responsibility and honesty as an elementary school teacher in the Fonseca neighborhood for 16 years. He has 2 children aged 12 and 15. They are in elementaru and secondary school. His wife take care of the household duties and caring for the children. Sebastian is studying now at the University to be able to get his degree in Educational Science and practice his profession more effectively.  

He is asking for his fourth loan to build a bedroom for his older daughter since she needs more privacy.    

His biggest dreams are for his children to study and grow in a healthy atmosphere and for them to lack for nothing.

loans.use: To build a bedroom

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente tiene 3 hijos, de 8, 14 y 18 años de edad, los 3 estudian y ayudan a sus padres en sus horas libre, su esposa se encarga de los quehaceres del hogar, Vicente trabaja para la escuela en la colonia desde hace 3 años, con responsabilidad y dedicaciòn ya que ama su trabajo y es bien querido por sus compañeros de trabajo, alumnos y padres de familia por su humildad y responsalidad que tanto lo caracteriza.  

Solicita la ayuda de Kiva en su primer crèdito  para construcciòn de una habitaciòn y asi mejorar sus condiciones y la de su familia.  

Su mayor sueño en la vida  es que sus hijos culmine sus estudios y tener estabilidad laboral para ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Vicente has 3 children ages 8, 14, and 18. All three are in school and help their parents in their spare time while his wife takes care of the chores at home. For the past 3 years Vicente has worked at a school in the area. He shows great responsibility and dedication since he loves his job. He is well like by his co-workers, students and parents for the humility and responsibility that he shows. 

He is requesting his first Kiva loan to build another room and so better his family's lifestyle. His greatest dream is that his children finish their studies and to have a stable job to continue to improve his family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To build a room

loans.name: Soximo Andres

texts.es: El cliente Soximo Andres Hernández F. se dedica a brindar servicios de mototaxi manifiesta que su mototaxi es propia pero no ha regularizado el cambio de la tarjeta de propiedad. Vive en casa alquilada con sus padres ya que se encuentra separado de su conyuge le pasa pensión a sus hijos. El solicitante requiere del crédito para gastos personales y cambiar el motor de la mototaxi, presenta buenas referencias personales y laborales no tiene experiencia acrediticia.
texts.en:
Soximo Andres Hernández F. provides motorcycle taxi services with his own vehicle, but he has not updated his vehicle registration card. He lives in a rented house with his parents since he is separated from his wife and pays child support.

Soximo needs a loan to pay for personal expenses and to replace the motor of his motorcycle taxi. He has good personal and work references despite not having previous credit experience.

loans.use: Pay for a replacement motor & cover a few personal expenses

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa  de 36 años de  edad, tiene una niña de 12 añitos la cual esta en su sexto grado de primaria en la Escuela Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell, su esposa labora como albañil, ambos son bien trabajadores y comparten con los gastos familiares y los compromisos adquiridos.  labora para el CETA INATEC  desde hace 5 años  desempeñandose como responsable de cocina de donde obtiene sus ingresos mensuales y garantizar el bienestar familiar.  

Solicita su tercer crèdito para acondicionar la habitacion donde ella duerme asì gozar de mas privacidad y un ambiente mas agradable en su hora de descanso. 

Se empeña por tener estabilidad laboral ya que es muy dificil encontrar trabajo, que su hija estudie y que su linda familia permanezca unida.
texts.en:
Teresa  is 36 years old. She has a 12 year old daughter in sixth grade in the Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell elementary school. Her husband works as a bricklayer. They are both very hardworking and share the family expenses and acquired responsibilities. She has worked for CETA INATEC for 5 years in charge of a kitchen. That is where she gets her monthly income and guarantees the family's wellbeing.  

She is asking for her third loan to remodel the bedroom where she sleeps so she can have more privacy and a better ambience when she is resting. 

She is working to have work stability since it is very difficult to find work. She wants her daughter to study and for her beautiful family to stay close.

loans.use: To remodel a bedroom

loans.name: Elba

texts.es:
Elba de 32 años de edad,  labora como docente de primaria en la Escuela Mauricio Cajina desde hace 5 años,  es madre soltera de 2 hijos de 11 y 7 añitos de edad, el mayor esta cursando su sexto grado de primaria y el menor estudia su segundo grado de educaciòn primaria, Elba es una mujer que ha luchado para que sus hijos no les falte nada a pesar que no recibe la ayuda del padre de sus hijos, les garantiza lo basico; es bien querida por sus alumnos y padres de familia.                                                                                          solicita su segundo crèdito para poner verjas al porche de la vivienda con el objetivo de que sus niños no se salguen a la calle cuando ella no se encuentre, tambien le va brindar mayor seguridad a su casa, es importante mencionar que esta clienta solamente ha trabajado con Afodenic, no tiene crèdito en ningun lugar y ha sido bien cumplida en el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.  

Su mayor sueño es brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos y prepararlos profesionalmente.
texts.en:
Elba, 32, has been employed as a Teacher at Mauricio Cajina School for the last five years.  She is a single mother of two children who are 11 and 7 years of age.  The oldest is in sixth grade and the youngest is in second grade in elementary school.

Elba is a woman who has fought so that her children lack nothing even though she gets no support from the children’s father.  She makes sure to provide them with the basics.  She is well liked by her students and their parents.

She is asking for her second loan to install metal grates on her house’s porch so that her children won’t go out into the street when she’s not home.  This will also provide better security to her home.

It’s important to mention that this client has only worked with Afodenic.  She does not have any loans any place else and she has met her monthly repayment obligations quite well.

Her dream is to provide the best for her children and to prepare them professionally.

loans.use: To install metal grates on her house.

loans.name: Santana

texts.es:
Don Santana de 44 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos, de 14,17 y 21 años de edad, el mayor trabaja y estudia y los 2 menores estudian y ayudan a su mamà con los quehaceres del hogar trabaja para el INTA desde hace 14 años como operario Especilizado,  el que ha desempeñado con gran responsabilidad y honestidad, por lo que es bien queridos por su jefe y compañeros de trabajo.                                                            Solicita su octavo crèdito para comprar zinc y madera para arreglar su vivienda ya que se encuentra en mal estado. 

Su mayor sueño en la vida, es que su familia goce de salud, amor y que permanezca bien con dios.
texts.en:
Santana, 44, has three children who are 14, 17 and 21 years old.  The oldest works and studies and the two youngest study and help their mother with household chores.  He has been employed as a Specialized Operator at INTA for the last 14 years.  He has worked with great honesty and responsibility which makes him well liked by his boss and coworkers.

He is asking for his 8th loan to buy zinc metal sheeting and lumber to repair his house which is in poor condition.

His greatest dream in life is that his family enjoys good health, love and be in good standing with God.

loans.use: To build toilets.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
El señor José Luis A. Aroní se dedica a la venta de leche y ganadería, su vivienda se encuentra ubicada en los Aquijes Ica lugar en donde tiene su ganado, vive con sus padres no tiene carga familiar por tal mótivo ayuda a sus padres en los gastos familiares . Solicita el crédito para comprar alimento para su ganado y otros gastos personales .
Se propone otorgarle el crédito por que en la evaluación presentó buenas referencias de sus vecinos y amigos también no tiene experiencia acrediticia por lo tanto tiene capacidad de pago.
texts.en:
Sr. José Luis A. Aroní sells milk and livestock. His home is located in Los Aquijes Ica, the place where he raises his cows. He lives with his parents, but he does not have any family responsibilities. However, José still helps with the family expenses. He is requesting a loan to buy feed for his cattle and to pay for other personal expenses.

Prior to the approval of this loan, José’s evaluation contained good references from his neighbors and friends. He does not have previous credit experience, but he does have the capacity to complete his repayments.

loans.use: Purchase feed for his cattle & pay for personal expenses

loans.name: Concepción Del Carmen
