Sra. Ivania Margine C. G. is an active employee of the Félix Pedro García Public School in San Rafael del Sur where she has worked as an elementary school teacher for twenty-one years. She has a son who is of school age.

Ivania has had nine loans with CEPRODEL and each one has been used to buy construction materials in order to expand and improve her home. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy artificial flowers to make floral arrangements for the deceased. In addition to her teaching job, she has a business arranging flowers. The loans from CEPRODEL have been a great benefit because they have enabled her to improve the living conditions for herself and her family.

loans.use: Purchase artificial flowers

loans.name: Estela Ofelia

texts.es:
La señora Estela M. se dedica a la venta de frutas en el Mercado Mayoreo y en especial a la venta de papayas ofreciéndolas a diario desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana.

La señora Estela se ha destacado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre ha llevado el sustento a su casa de habitación. Actualmente solicita un crédito para la compra de las papayas para continuar con su venta. Espera ser beneficiada con dicho crédito y así continuar en la venta y sobre todo suplir la necesidad de los clientes que a diario le visitan.
texts.en:
Sra. Estela M. sells fruit at the Wholesale Market, especially papayas that she offers every day from the early hours of the morning. She is known for being a hard worker and always having the ability to maintain her household.

Sra. Estela is currently requesting a loan to buy papayas so that she can continue her sales. She hopes to be a beneficiary of this loan so that she can continue generating sales and meet the needs of her customers who visit daily.

loans.use: Acquire papayas

loans.name: Cleotilde Del Carmen

texts.es:
En el Mercado Mayoreo, la señora Cleotilde G. se dedica a la actividad de venta de frutas especialmente la venta de papayas que lleva a cabo en su localidad. Es una dama muy trabajadora que ha sabido administrar muy bien su negocio y ha logrado salir adelante mejorando sus condiciones.

Hoy en día solicita el crédito para la compra de las papayas para la venta. Es importante destacar que las papayas se han estado vendiendo mucho por lo que requiere tener dicho perecedero para lograr satisfacer las demandas de sus clientes y así continuar proyectándose como una gran comerciante.
texts.en:
At the Wholesale Market Sra. Cleotilde G. sells fruit, especially papayas that are shipped in to her area. She is a hardworking woman who knows how to manage her business well and improve its conditions.

Today she is requesting a loan to buy papayas to sell. It is important to know that papayas have been selling well, so she needs more of these perishable products to satisfy the demands of her customers and maintain her great reputation as a merchant.

loans.use: Acquire papayas to sell

loans.name: Juan Ramón

texts.es: El Sr. Juan Ramón A. C. él es trabajador activo de la empresa Contratista “Jairo Agustín Vargas Mendoza” desempeñándose como guarda de seguridad tiene  tres años de trabajar para esta empresa, es Acompañado actualmente, tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  cuatro  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Ramón A. C. has worked for three years as a security guard at Jairo Agustín Vargas Mendoza's business.  He is married and has two school aged children.  

He has had four loans with CEPRODEL, which he has used to purchase construction materials to expand and improve his home.  Those loans have benefited him a lot because he has improved his family's quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials: sand, cement, and stone

loans.name: Luisa Lilliam

texts.es:
La señora Luisa se ha destacado por vender frutas y verduras en el M. Mayoreo donde a diario ofrece los productos a todas las personas que visitan el M.. Ella lleva al sustento a su hogar y también es importante destacar que mantiene a tres pequeñas nietas por lo que duplica sus esfuerzos para obtener dichos ingresos y así sustentar su núcleo familiar.

El crédito que solicita será invertido en la compra de las frutas y verduras en especial en la compra de naranjas. Ella confía que el crédito le será proporcionado y así venderá dichas naranjas a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sra. Luisa has been known for selling fruits and vegetables at the Wholesale Market where she offers her products every day to those who visit the market. It is important to note that she has to support her household, which also includes three young granddaughters. Therefore, she must double her efforts so that she can generate income to provide for her family.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy fruits and vegetables, especially oranges. Luisa hopes that her loan will be granted so that she can sell these oranges to her customers.

loans.use: Purchase oranges to sell

loans.name: Max Elías

texts.es: El Sr. Max Elías V. V. él es trabajador activo de la empresa Contratista “Jairo Agustín Vargas Mendoza” desempeñándose como guarda de seguridad tiene  dos años de trabajar para esta empresa, es Acompañado actualmente, tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Mr. Max Elías V. V. is an active employee of the "Jairo Agustín Vargas Mendoza" contracting firm where he has worked as a security guard for two years.  He lives with his partner and two school-aged children.  He has received two loans from CEPRODEL, both of which have been used to purchase construction material for home improvement and expansion.  The CEPRODEL loans have been very beneficial and have allowed him to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials: sand, cement, stone, gravel

loans.name: Jenny De Los Ágeles

texts.es:
La venta de frutas es la actividad a la que se dedica la joven Jenny G. en el Mercado Mayoreo en Managua. Es una persona muy trabajadora que desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia sus ventas y se ha ganado el cariño de muchos clientes que le compran el productos.

Actualmente está solicitando un crédito para ser invertido directamente en la compra de bananos para la venta ya que están siendo muy demandados. Espera ser beneficiada con el crédito y así mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su amada familia que tanto lo necesita ya que percibirá mayores ingresos por las ventas.
texts.en:
Jenny G. is a young woman who sells fruit at the Wholesale Market in Managua. She is a hardworking individual who begins selling in the early morning hours and has earned the affection of many of the customers who buy her products.

Jenny is currently requesting a loan to invest directly in the purchase of bananas to sell since they are in great demand. She hopes to benefit from this is loan so that she can improve the living conditions for her beloved family. Therefore, she needs to generate more revenue from her sales.

loans.use: Purchase bananas to sell

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en: The Kiva borrower is a 27-year-old single man living with his parents. He is from Lebanon.  He has been running an IT/computer repair shop since 2003. He works with computers in addition to his full-time education studies at the university. His father is the main income provider of his family but his income is an important source of support for his father. With his loan request of $1200 from Kiva's partner organization Ameen s.a.l., he will purchase new tools and accessories for his business in order to improve his business level. He will buy them from a wholesaler at a good price. He estimates his business will grow about 15% in the coming year. In the future, he is looking to open a computer accessories shop.

loans.use: Purchase new tools and accessories for computer business

loans.name: Marsu Group

texts.en:
Marsu V., who is holding the sign, is the leader of this group of five borrowers called the Marsu Group.  She is 38 years old, married, and has five children who are between the ages of 9 and 20 years. She was not able to attend school due to financial constraints. 

For 6 years, she has been operating a mini restaurant in the Redlight Community on the outskirts of Monrovia, Liberia. She plans to use her 6,000 Liberian Dollar portion of this 30,000 Liberian Dollar group loan to buy more rice, fish, meat, seasonings, pepper, salt and other ingredients. 

She describes herself as a hard-working woman whose goals are to improve her business and the standard of living of her family.

loans.use: To buy rice, fish, meat, seasonings, pepper, salt and other ingredients.

loans.name: Ayda Lina

texts.es: Ayda Lina tiene una mini tienda ubicada en su casa de habitación, ella es una mujer muy emprendedora que disfruta de su negocio, ya que también es muy independiente en su negocio y hogar. Anteriormente se dedicaba a una pulpería, fue con el paso del tiempo y la experiencia que ha obtenido que ha salido adelante y proporcionado a sus hijos lo necesario para salir adelante.  Ella tiene bastante clientela ha logrado mantener el volumen de sus ventas. El crédito será invertido en la compra de sabanas, toallas, calzado, ropa interior, perfumes entre otras cosas. Ella sueña con mejorar su negocio pues ha sido, muy satisfactorio para su familia.
texts.en: Ayda Lina has a little store in her house. She is an entrepreneur that enjoys her work, as she’s a very independent woman in her household and in her business. She used to work in a local market, but with the passing of time and experience, she’s managed to move upward and onward, always able to support her children and enable them to prosper. The business enjoys a large client base and she’s been able to maintain the volume of sales.  The loan will be invested in bed sheets, towels, shoes, underwear and perfume, among other items. She dreams of making her business better, as it’s been a source of satisfaction for her family.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for her store, like bed sheets, towels, shoes, underwear and perfume.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es:
La señora Rosa Argentina G. G.  tiene  una Pulpería desde hace 2 año, es casada su esposo Trabajaba vendiendo madera, tiene una persona a cargo que depende de ella y de los ingresos del esposo. 

Es Primera vez que tiene un crédito en CEPRODEL, el cual utilizará para la inversión en mercadería como es la compra de 2 pacas de ropa usada y un quintal de arroz.
texts.en:
Mrs Rosa Argentina G. G. has had a small grocery store for 2 years.  She is married and her husband works selling wood.  She has one person in her care who depends on her and on her husband's income.

This is the first time that she has had a loan from CEPRODEL.  She will use it to invest in merchandise such as the purchase of 2 packages of second-hand clothes and 100 lb of rice.

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise, basic grains, etc.

loans.name: Edgar Avilés

texts.es: El Sr. Edgar Avilés C. es trabajador Activo de la Empresa CEMEX Nicaragua desempeñándose como Facilitador  tiene Diez  años de trabajar para esta institución es casado actualmente. Ha tenido  tres  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando para compra de medicamentos y gastos personales, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Mr Edgar Avilés C. works for the company CEMEX Nicaragua as an instructor and has been working for this company for ten years.  He is married.  He has had three loans with CEPRODEL and each one has been used to buy building materials to extend and improve his house.  He is requesting this loan to buy medicine and for personal expenses.  His loans with CEPRODEL have been of great benefit to him since he has been able to improve his whole family's standard of living.

loans.use: Personal expenses and medicine

loans.name: Pierso Ulises

texts.es:
En el Mercado Iván Montenegro en Managua, el señor Pierson Juarez se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos como queso en su propio establecimiento. Es muy visitado por diversa cantidad de clientes y busca la forma de vender más queso para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y llevar el sustento a su hogar.

El crédito que actualmente está solicitando es para la compra del queso seco, queso fresco, queso crema  y quesillo. Espera ser beneficiado y de esta manera continuar supliendo las necesidades de su hogar y atender la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mr Pierson Juarez sells dairy products such as cheese from his own establishment in the Iván Montenegro Market in Managua.  He has a diverse quantity of customers and he is looking for ways to sell more cheese to satisfy the needs of his customers and support his household.

The loan which he is currently requesting will be used to buy 'queso seco' (a dry, aged cheese), 'queso fresco' (a crumbly, soft cheese), 'queso crema' (a heavy cream similar to crème fraiche) and 'quesillo' (a soft cheese).  He hopes that with his loan he will be able to keep fulfilling his household's needs and meet his customers' demand.

loans.use: To buy cheese

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es:
El señor Rafael Ampié Z. tiene 53 años de edad, trabaja como coordinador de la sala general de la biblioteca municipal del barrio La Reynaga, el tiene aspiraciones personales en su trabajo como es crear un proyecto para incentivar la lectura de cuentos en los niños del barrio La Reynaga, se preocupa por que la niñez actual está muy influenciada por los programas de televisión que en su mayoría no ayudan a enriquecer la cultura general de los niños.

Es casado, con dos hijos en edad escolar. Su esposa es periodista de  Radio Nicaragua.

Es primera vez que hace préstamo, dice que le gustó la política de crédito que le ofreció CEPRODEL y por medio de este crédito podrá mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Mr Rafael Ampié Z. is 53 years old.  He works as a co-ordinator in the main area of the  municipal library in La Reynaga neighborhood.  He has personal aspirations in his work such as creating a project to encourage the reading of stories to the children of La Reynaga neighborhood.  He is worried that children today are very much influenced by television programs, most of which do not help to enrich the children's general culture.

Rafael is married with two school-age children.  His wife is a reporter for Radio Nicaragua.

This is the first time that he has taken a loan.  He says that he liked the loan policy which CEPRODEL offered him and with this loan he would be able to improve his house.

loans.use: Improvements to his house: purchase of corrugated metal roofing to improve his kitchen

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy rice, fish, meat, beans, seasonings, pepper, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy cartons of fish

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Compra de mercadería para el negocio ropa en general, tela.
texts.en: Purchase of merchandise for her business.  Clothes and fabric.

loans.use: Sale of clothes and toys

loans.name: Faucto

texts.es:
En el Mercado Iván Montenegro, el señor Faucto H. se ha destacado por ser comerciante de productos lácteos como el queso siendo vendido a diario por el mismo en un local muy concurrido por consumidores que compran el queso.

Está solicitando un crédito para invertirlo en la compra del queso seco y queso crema para continuar ofertándolo y de esta manera sus clientes puedan comprarle sin ninguna dificultad. Espera que el crédito le sea proporcionado sin problemas y de esta forma continuar en su actividad en su localidad.
texts.en:
In the Iván Montenegro Market, Mr Faucto H. has stood out as a seller of dairy products such as the cheese which he sells every day in his store.  His store is very busy with customers buying cheese.

He is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of 'queso seco'  (dry, aged cheese) and 'queso crema' (heavy cream similar to crème fraiche) so that he can continue offering it and so that his customers can buy it from him without difficulty.  He hopes that he will receive his loan without problems and that he can thereby continue working.

loans.use: To buy cheese

loans.name: Sandra Azucena

texts.es: La señora Sandra azucena P. C. tiene una farmacia ubicada en el barrio santa Ana tiene de tenerla 16 años y medio comenzó su negocio con un capital de c$ 1,000.00 ahorro anteriormente alquilaba para su negocio y actualmente tiene su negocio en su casa, es viuda y sale adelante con su hijo  que estudia en la universidad y con estos financiamientos ha salido adelante y ha mejorado su negocio.
texts.en: Ms. Sandra Azucena Perez C. has had a pharmacy located in the neighborhood of Santa Ana for sixteen and a half years. She started her business with C$1000 savings.  Earlier she rented space for her business but now she has her business in her home. She is a widow and lives with her son who is studying at the university. With these loans she has been getting ahead and improving her business.

loans.use: Compra de medicamentos para su negocio

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw materials for food preparation

loans.name: Isabel Cristina

texts.es:
La señora Isabel Cristina M.  tiene  una Pulpería desde hace 6 años, Tiene 14 años de vivir en esta misma dirección, es casada su esposo Trabajaba en Banex (Banco del éxito) Doña Isabel Cristina tiene dos persona a cargo que depende de ella y de los ingresos del esposo. 

Es cliente A de CEPRODEL desde enero del 2005 habiendo trabajado  a la fecha 7 créditos, pagándolos en tiempo y forma, los cuales ha utilizado para la inversión en mercadería. Tal como Arroz, Frijoles, cereales, Aceite y productos varios
texts.en:
Ms. Isabel Cristina M. has had a general store for 6 years. She has lived for 14 years at the same address. She is married and her husband works at Banex. Ms. Isabel Cristina has two dependents that depend on her income and that of her husband. 

She has been a client of CEPRODEL since January 2005, having worked through at this time 7 loan cycles, paying them in a timely manner, which she has used to invest in the purchase of merchandise for her store such as rice, beans, cereals, oil and various products.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for inventory

loans.name: Leila Del Socorro

texts.es: Leila Del Socorro tiene 59 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 10 años que tiene este negocio, con la ayuda de su esposo por lo que tiene 2 hijos a su cargo. Ha tenido ciertas dificultades, por las constantes lluvias que se habían presentado esto no le permitía salir a vender a las calles la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes, los productos que ofrece son cremas, calzado, toallas, sabanas, ropa en general, ropa interior entre otras cosas. Ella sueña con proporcionarle a su familia los ingresos necesarios pues siempre se ha caracterizado por brindar un buen servicio. El crédito es para la compra de materia prima como ropa, calzado, cosméticos y otros productos varios.
texts.en: Leila Del Socorro is 59 years old. She works selling general merchandise. It has been more than 10 years since she started this business. With the help of her husband, she supports 2 dependent children. She has had some difficulties such as the constant rain that prevents her from going out to sell in the streets the variety of products that she offers her customers. She sells creams, shoes, towels, sheets, basic clothing and underwear, among other things. She dreams of providing her family the necessary income because she has always been known to provide good products and services. The loan she is requesting is to buy inventory such as clothes, towels, cosmetics and other various products.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Augusto Cesar

texts.es:
El señor Augusto Cesar G. S., tiene un negocio de impresiones de tarjetas, invitaciones,
Tiene de tenerla 5 años  es casado un niño en edad escolar, este financiamiento lo solicito para invertirlo en su negocio ya que necesitaba comprar papelería ya que viene la época de promociones de los colegios y escuelas en las que el saca provecho ya que le encargan bastante tipos de tarjetas. Tiene cuatro años de trabajar con Ceprodel en los cuales le han servido a salir adelante su negocio ha incrementado  y tiene buen inventario.
texts.en: Mr. Augusto Cesar Gonzalez S. has a business printing cards and invitations. He has been married 5 years and has a school age child. This loan he is requesting is to invest in his business to buy stationary because now comes the time of graduations from High School and Primary Schools where he needs to provide a large number of types of cards and invitations. He has worked with CEPRODEL for 4 years has served his business well in getting ahead. He has increased his business and has a good inventory.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his business such as paper, tape and machine maintenance.

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es:
La señora Karla Martinez tiene su propio negocio de venta de bebidas como gaseosas, jugos y agua en su localidad. También ofrece alimentos a sus clientes que a diario le visitan para el desayuno o almuerzo.

Ella ha logrado salir adelante a pesar de las dificultades económicas que siempre se atraviesan. Hoy en día está solicitando un crédito para ser invertido en la compra de la materia prima como arroz, pollo, carne de res y las bebidas. Espera que dicho crédito le sea otorgado y así mejorar su condición económica ya que venderá los alimentos y bebidas a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Karla Martinez has her own business selling drinks such as sodas, juices, and water in her area.  She also provides food to customers who visit her daily for breakfast or lunch.

She has managed to succeed despite the economic difficulties that she always goes through.  Today she is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of raw materials such as rice, chicken, beef, and beverages.  She hopes that this loan will be granted, and she will sell food and beverages to her customers, thereby improving her economic condition.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials for food preparation.

loans.name: Duvon De Fatima

texts.es:
Duvon Jiménez R. es una persona emprendedora quien tiene su negocio en el mercado Israel Lewite de venta de Jugos, gaseosas, golosinas y galletas, ella trabaja junto con uno de sus hijos quien se encarga de vender arriba de los buses. Ella es una persona sencilla y con buenos principios morales.
Es madre de familia de  siete  hijos y solo dos  dependen de ella y estos se encuentran en el colegio.
El préstamo lo quiere para la compra de mercadería para su negocio.
Duvon Jiménez ha trabajado 20 préstamos con la institución y estos han sido para la compra de mercadería para su negocio.
texts.en:
Duvon Jiménez R. is a very enterprising person who has a business in the Israel Lewite market selling juice, soda, sweets and cookies.  She works together with one of her children who is in charge of making sales on buses.  She is a very humble person with good moral principles.

She is mother to seven children.  Only two of her children still depend on her and they are in school.  The loan which she requesting will be used for buying merchandise for her business.  Duvon Jiménez has had 20 loans from our organization which were all for buying merchandise for her business.

loans.use: Purchase of soda, juice, cookies, Kola Shaler and candies

loans.name: La Cabañita Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama "La cabañita", decidieron ponerle este nombre por que se reúnen en la cabañita que tiene la representante del grupo en su casa, es por eso que eligieron este nombre, esta historia es acerca de la señora Natividad G. G., ya que es la representante de dicho grupo, tiene 37 años de edad, esta casada con el señor Porfirio con el cual tiene 2 hijos José Alberto y Karen Arlet, de los cuales los dos están estudiando la primaria, uno sexto y la otra cuarto año, ella tiene una tienda de abarrotes con la cual lleva apenas de 4 años.

Ella eligió esta actividad, ya que quería buscar la manera de apoyar a su esposo con los gastos económicos y la educación de sus hijos y para mejor su calidad de vida aparte de que es una muy buena fuente de ingresos, es por eso que decidió empezar con este negocio, con el préstamo que recibió va a continuar invirtiendo en se tienda en la compra de mas mercancía como son: sal, azúcar, arroz, fríjol, sopas, refrescos, aguas, jugos, huevos, aceite, jabón, papel higiénico, veladoras y muchos otros productos que le hacen falta para tener mas variedad y tener muy bien surtida su tienda..

Su negocio le esta sirviendo de mucho, ya que de las ganancias obtenidas, esta sacando para continuar apoyando a sus hijos con sus estudios e ir mejorando cada vez mas su calidad de vida, además de que esta ahorrando para comprarles una computadora a sus hijos para que hagan sus tareas. 

Doña Nati dice que su meta  es la de hacer que su negocio crezca empresarialmente, ya que quiere construir un local más grande, por que lo que quiere es hacerlo crecer mucho mas para convertirlo en una abarroteria y de esta forma tenerlo muy bien surtido y así obtener más y mejores ganancias, también esta pensando en poner una farmacia ya que en su comunidad no hay ningún negocio de estos.  

Ella dice que conoce muy bien a sus compañeros y nos comenta que son personas muy responsables, gente trabajadora, confiable que tienen ganas de salir adelante y superarse y por lo mismo en ninguna ocasión se han atrasado o fallado con los pagos de su crédito

Da las gracias a los prestatarios de kiva, por darle la oportunidad y confianza, pero sobre todo por creer en ella, puesto que gracias a su ayuda pudo invertir en su negocio y asi tener un mejor futuro.

Los integrantes del grupo de la cabañita y las actividades que realizan son:
Isabel L. M.-venta de frutas y verduras
Honorina V. V.-venta de frutas y verduras
Leticia M. R.-venta de frutas y verduras
Jeammy G. R.-venta de refrescos
Elvis S. G.-venta de frutas y verduras
Natividad G. G.-tienda de abarrotes
Maria Félix G. M.-venta de dulces
Yurivia G. L.-venta de dulces
Hortensia M. ZaM.-venta de pollos
Elena V. M.-tienda de abarrotes
Adelina G. O.-venta de frutas y verduras
Crisanta R. B.-venta de frutas y verduras
Carmela A. M.-venta de frutas y verduras
Adelina G. O.-venta de perfumes
Cipriana R. M.-venta de dulces
Carmen B. R.-venta de frutas y verduras
***La señora sentada de blusa color amarillo con una niña en brazos, no forma parte del grupo****
texts.en:
This group is called “The Little Cabin”.  They decided to give it this name because they meet in a small cabin at the group representative’s house.  This story is about Ms. Natividad G. G., since she is the representative of the group.

She is 37 years old, married to Porfirio, with whom she has 2 children: José Alberto and Karen Arlet.  Both children are in primary school, one in sixth grade and the other in fourth grade.  She has had a grocery store for 4 years.

She chose this activity because she had to find a way to help her husband with the household expenses and their children’s education.  She also wanted to improve their standard of living and, the fact that the business is a good income producer, is the reason she decided on this type of enterprise.  

She plans to use the loan she received to continue investing in her store.  She would like to purchase additional merchandise such as: salt, sugar, rice, beans, soups, beverages, waters, juices, eggs, oil, soap, toilet paper, candles, and many other products that she’s missing, in order to have a good variety of merchandise and a well-supplied store.

Her business is serving her well, as her earnings allow her to support her children in their studies as well as to improve their quality of life.  In addition, she is saving to buy a computer for her children so they can use it to do their homework. 

Nati states that her goal is to expand her business, and she would like to build a larger locale in order to grow much more and convert it into a store that is well-stocked and generates more income for her.  She is also thinking about installing a pharmacy, as there are none in her community.

She states that she knows her associates very well, and comments that they are very responsible, hard-working and trustworthy people who have a great desire to get ahead and succeed.  Likewise, at no point have they defaulted or been late with their loan payments.

She gives thanks to the lenders on Kiva, for giving her this opportunity and their trust but most of all, for believing in her.  Thanks to their help, she can invest in her business and look forward to a brighter future.  

The members of the group and the activities they carry out are:

Isabel L. M. – Fruits and vegetable sales
Honorina V. V. – Fruits and vegetable sales
Leticia M. R. – Fruits and vegetable sales
Jeammy G. R. – Beverage sales 
Elvis S. G. - Fruits and vegetable sales
Natividad G. G. – Grocery store 
Maria Félix G. M. – Candy sales 
Yurivia G. L. – Candy sales 
Hortensia M. ZaM. – Poultry sales

Carmen B. R. - Fruits and vegetable sales

***The woman in the yellow blouse, seated and holding a little girl, is not part of the group****


Da las gracias a los prestatarios de kiva, por darle la oportunidad y confianza, pero sobre todo por creer en ella, puesto que gracias a su ayuda pudo invertir en su negocio y asi tener un mejor futuro.

Los integrantes del grupo de la cabañita y las actividades que realizan son:
Isabel L. M.-venta de frutas y verduras
Honorina V. V.-venta de frutas y verduras
Leticia M. R.-venta de frutas y verduras
Jeammy G. R.-venta de refrescos
Elvis S. G.-venta de frutas y verduras

Maria Félix G. M.-venta de dulces
Yurivia G. L.-venta de dulces
Hortensia M. ZaM.-venta de pollos
Elena V. M.-tienda de abarrotes
Adelina G. O.-venta de frutas y verduras
Crisanta R. B.-venta de frutas y verduras
Carmela A. M.-venta de frutas y verduras

***La señora sentada de blusa color amarillo con una niña en brazos, no forma parte del grupo****

loans.use: Purchase of more merchandise such as:  milk, rice, beans, cookies, oil, beverages, and other items for her store.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: La Sra. Reyna Isabel R. A. es trabajadora Activa de la empresa D.G.I desempeñándose como Responsable de Agencia tiene doce  años de trabajar para esta institución. Ha tenido  dos   créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo esta solicitando para ampliarle un cuarto más a su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Mrs Reyna Isabel R. A. is a hard-working woman.  She works for the D.G.I (the Nicaraguan General Revenue Service) as a branch manager.  She has been working for the D.G.I for twelve years.  She has had two loans from CEPRODEL and each one has been used to buy building materials to extend and improve her house.  She is requesting this loan to add a room to her house.  Her loans with CEPRODEL have been of great benefit to her as they have helped her to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: Sand, cement, stone and blocks

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase pepper, onions, red oil, salt, beans, etc.

loans.name: Dolores Isabel

texts.es:
Ella tiene 53 años de edad, viuda y con 2 personas a su cargo, una sobrina y su mamá que es una anciana. Vive en el barrio la Fuente, en la parte central de la capital. Donde tiene su negocio desde hace 10 años.

En todos estos años ha demostrado ser un buen cliente. Con un buen record crediticio. Ella vende comida tales como: pollo tapado, asado, frito, en caldo, carne desmenuzada, carne asada de res, sopas de res, cerdo asado, frito, y gran variedad de fresco. La comida tiene un precio de C$ 40.00 córdobas, y fresco a C$7.00 Córdobas.

La Sra. Dolores M. es cliente de CEPRODEL desde febrero del 2002 donde ha trabajado 7 créditos con nuestra institución. Los que ha utilizado para invertir en su negocio, ayudándole a permanecer en el mercado durante todos estos años de existencia del negocio. También parte de este dinero lo ha invertido en la mejora de su casa.
texts.en:
Dolores is 53 years old.  She is a widow and has two people in her care; a niece and her mother who is a pensioner.  She lives in La Fuente neighborhood in the central part of the capital.  She has had a business there for 10 years.

In all these years she has had good customers and a good credit record.  She sells meals such as 'pollo tapado' (a type of Nicaraguan chicken stew), roast chicken, fried chicken, chicken stew, 'carne desmenuzada' (shredded meat - a typical Nicaraguan dish), roasted meat, 'sopa de res' (a traditional meat stew), roasted pork, fried pork and a good variety of soft drinks.  The meals are priced at 40 Nicaraguan cordobas and the drinks are priced at 7 cordobas.

Mrs Dolores M. has been a client of CEPRODEL since February 2002.  She has had 7 loans from our organization which she has used to invest in her business, helping her to stay in the market during all these years that she has been in business.  Part of this money has also been invested in improving her house.

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise and supplies

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Erlinda Isabel

texts.es: La Señora Erlinda Isabel C. U. es comerciante del Mercado central su negocio es el de venta de verduras es madre de 2 hijos que están a su cargo y por los que lucha para sacarlos adelante estos financiamientos  los ha solicitado para invertirlo en su negocio y comprar tomate, piña, cebolla, chiltoma. La señora C. U. se siente muy agradecida con Ceprodel ya que le hemos ayudado cuando nos ha necesitado y su negocio ha incrementado bastante sus ventas y sus ganancias las cuales las ha invertido en su casa y con su familia para salir adelante poco a poco
texts.en: Mrs. Erlinda Isabel C. U. is a merchant in the Central Market.  She sells vegetables.  She is the mother of two children who are at home and these are why she struggles to get ahead.  She has requested the loans to use for her business by buying tomatoes, pineapples, onions and sweet peppers.  Mrs C. U. feels very appreciative of Ceprodel since we have helped her when she needed it.  Her business has grown substantially both in sales and in income-which she has used for her house and so that her family will have a better standard of living little by little.

loans.use: To buy vegetables: tomatoes, onions, sweet peppers, limes, etc.

loans.name: Roger Alejandro

texts.es:
Roger Alejandro Díaz García, es una persona emprendedora quien tiene su negocio en la terminal de los buses inter-locales que viajan a león, Jinotepe, Masaya y granada y este esta ubicado frente la universidad Centro Americana UCA. El vende almuerzos, desayunos y gaseosa en ese sector, además cuenta con dos trabajadoras quienes se encargan de preparar la comida y de la atención de los clientes. 
El es padre de familia de dos hijos y uno de ellos se encuentra en el colegio, es una persona sencilla y con buenos principios morales.
El préstamo lo quiere para la compra de mercadería para su negocio.
Roger Díaz ha trabajado 8 préstamos con la institución y estos han sido para la compra de mercadería para su negocio.
texts.en:
Roger Alejandro Díaz García is an enterprising person who has his business in the intercity bus terminal.  The buses travel to León, Jinotepe, Masaya and Granada.  The bus terminal is opposite UCA (The University of Central America).  He sells lunches, breakfasts and soda in this area.  He  has two female employees who are in charge of preparing the meals and serving customers.

Roger Díaz is the father of two children, one of whom is at school.  He is a humble person with good moral principles.

The loan which he is requesting will be used for buying merchandise for his business.

Roger Díaz has had 8 loans from our organization and they have all been used for buying merchandise for his business.

loans.use: Purchase of soda, juice, rice, oil, pork, chicken and perishable products

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more gallons of red oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase sand, stone and blocks and to cover medical expenses

loans.name: Belinda Walkiria

texts.es: La señora Belinda Walkiria C. T. es comerciante del Mercado central tiene un negocio de venta de productos es soltera madre de dos hijos los que están en edad y por los que lucha fuertemente trabaja de lunes a domingo y este financiamiento lo solicito para comprar cosméticos para su negocio que casi no tenia en existencia, tiene cinco años de trabajar con nuestra institución en los cuales dichos créditos los ha invertido en su negocio y ha obtenido buenas utilidades las cuales las ha invertido en su casa y en su calidad de vida
texts.en: Mrs Belinda Walkiria C. T. is a merchant in the 'Mercado Central' (central market).  She has a sales business.  She is a single mother to two children for whom she struggles really hard.  She works from Monday to Sunday and the loan which she is requesting will be used to buy cosmetics for her business as she has virtually none left.  She has been working with our organization for five years and has used her loans to invest in her business.  She has obtained good profits which she has invested in her house and in raising her standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetics, toys and clothes

loans.name: Mirna Patricia

texts.es: Mirna Patricia desde sus inicios se ha preocupado por mejorar sus ingresos ella tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Tiene 24 años, Es una mujer muy activa y alegre que le encanta su trabajo. Se dedica a la venta y compra de bananos, desde hace 10 años que tiene este medio de vida. Trabaja de lunes a viernes desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche pues con la ayuda de su familia que anteriormente tenían a cargo el negocio y ahora le pertenece a ella. Este crédito lo va a emplear en compra de bananos ya que tiene ciertos pedidos y se acercan los meses que mas ventas tiene. El sueño de ella es proporcionarle mejoras a  su casa y mantener activo el negocio.
texts.en: Mirna Patricia has, from the very beginning, been concerned about improving her profits.  She has two young children in her care.  She is 24 years old.  Mirna is a very active and happy woman who loves her work.  She is in the business of buying and selling bananas.  She has been in this business for 10 years.  She works from Monday to Friday from 8 in the morning until 9 at night with the help of her family who used to run the business which now belongs to her.  This loan will be used to buy bananas since she has existing orders and the months in which she has most sales are approaching.  Her dream is to be able to improve her house and keep her business active.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Nery Veronica

texts.es:
La Sra. Nery Verónica Méndez J. es una persona emprendedora quien tiene su negocio en el mercado Israel Lewite de Managua de venta de ropa interior para caballeros y damas y venta de frutas y verduras, ella trabaja de lunes a domingos de las 6 de la mañana hasta las cinco de la tarde, ella es madre de familia de tres  hijos y  uno de ellos se encuentra en el colegio.
El préstamo solicitado es para la compra de mercadería su negocio.
Nery Verónica dice que gracias a los préstamos otorgados por ceprodel han sido invertidos en su negocio, por lo que ahora cuenta con mas productos para ofertar.
texts.en:
Mrs Nery Verónica Méndez J. is an enterprising person who has her business in the Israel Lewite Market in Managua.  She sells men's and women's underwear and also fruit and vegetables.  She works from Monday to Sunday from 6 in the morning until 5 in the evening.  She is mother to three children.  One of her children is in school.

The loan which she is requesting is to purchase merchandise for her business.

Nery Verónica tells us that thanks to the loans which CEPRODEL has given her, she has invested in her business which means that she now has more products to offer.

loans.use: Purchase of clothes and perishable products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To improve her home: sewage lines, roof and electrical repairs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Sand, cement, stone, cinderblocks.

loans.name: Carla Mayela

texts.es: La señora Carla Mayela P. P. es comerciante del mercado central desde hace once años  es soltera y a cargo de tres hijos por los que lucha fuertemente trabaja de lunes a domingo de seis de la mañana a seis de la tarde  anteriormente la señora Carla P. le ayudaba en el negocio a su esposo y posteriormente decidió poner su negocio y no depender de nadie  con estos financiamientos la señora Carla P. ha incrementado su negocio y ha salido adelante poco a poco.
texts.en: Carla Mayela P. P. has been a merchant at the central market for eleven years.  She is single, and cares for three children for whom she struggles tremendously.  She works Mondays through Sundays from 6 am to 6 pm.  Previously, Carla P. helped out at her husband’s business.  She later decided to start her own business and not rely on anyone.  Carla has used her loans to grow her business, and to get ahead little by little.

loans.use: Top purchase tote bags and purses.

loans.name: Ernesto José

texts.es:
EL Sr. Ernesto José P. es una persona emprendedora quien tiene su negocio en el mercado Israel Lewite de Managua de venta de accesorios para celulares, reloj, el trabaja de lunes a sábado de las 7 de la mañana hasta las cinco de la tarde, el es padre de familia de cuarto hijos y solo dos dependen de el y estos se encuentran en el colegio.
El préstamo solicitado es para la compra de mercadería para su negocio como: fajas, baterías para reloj, cargadores y chip claro y movistar.
Ernesto dice que gracias a los préstamos otorgados por ceprodel su negocio ha crecido y ahora puede competir con la competencia.
texts.en: Ernesto José P. is an entrepreneurial person who has his business located at the Israel Lewite market in Managua.  He sells cell phone accessories and watch parts.  He works Monday through Saturday from 7 am to 5 pm.  He is the father of four children; only two are of school age and dependent on him.  The loan requested is to purchase merchandise for his business such as:  watch bands and batteries, cell phone chargers and memory chips.  Ernesto says that, thanks to the loans he has received through CEPRODEL, his business has grown and he can better compete.

loans.use: To purchase watch bands and batteries, cell phone chargers and memory chips.

loans.name: Argelia María

texts.es: La Sra. Argelia María C. S. es trabajadora Activa del Ministerio de Educación desempeñándose como Sud-Directora de un Colegio de Secundaria  tiene diez años de trabajar para esta institución, es casada actualmente tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  nueve créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo esta solicitando para la instalación de un inodoro, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Sra. Argelia María C. S. is an active worker in the Ministry of Education, where her position is assistant principal of a secondary school. She has worked for this institution for 10 years. She is married and now has a son of school age. She has had nine loans with CEPRODEL, and each one has been for the purchase of construction materials to expand and improve her home. She is applying for this loan to install a toilet. The loans from CEPRODEL have benefited her greatly, since in this way she has improved her living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: Buy sand, cement, a toilet, and blocks.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy rice, oil, soap, sardines, pepper, beans and other items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Improve her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy construction materials to improve her home.

loans.name: María Veronica

texts.es:
La Sra. María Verónica C. es una persona emprendedora quien tiene su negocio en el mercado Israel Lewite de Managua de venta de ropa, ella trabaja de lunes a domingos de las 7 de la mañana hasta las cinco de la tarde, ella es madre de familia de dos niños los que a su vez se encuentran en el colegio.
El préstamo solicitado es para la compra de mercadería para su negocio como: ropa interior, pantalones, chinelas, toallas.
María dice que gracias a los préstamos otorgados por ceprodel su negocio ha crecido y ahora puede competir con la competencia.
texts.en:
Ms. María Verónica C. is an enterprising individual who runs her clothing sales business in the Israel Lewite market in Managua.  She works from Monday through Sunday, from 7 in the morning until 5 in the afternoon.  She is the mother of a family with two children who are in secondary school.

The requested loan is to buy merchandise for her business, such as: undergarments, pants, slippers, and towels.  María says that thanks to previous loans she has received through CEPRODEL, her business has grown and she is now able to compete with the competition.

loans.use: to buy undergarments, pants, slippers, towels

loans.name: Roger Enrique

texts.es: El Sr. Roger Enrique G. G. es trabajador Activo de la  Cooperativa de Ahorro y Crédito San Rafael del Sur desempeñándose como Gestor de Cobro, tiene dos años de trabajar para esta institución, es casado actualmente. Ha tenido  dos  créditos con CEPRODEL y  cada uno lo ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando para gastos personales en su hogar, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el  ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Roger Enrique G. G. works as a collections manager for the San Rafael del Sur Savings and Loan Cooperative. He has worked there for the past two years and is currently married. He has had two loans with Kiva partner CEPRODEL and has used each one to purchase construction materials to expand and improve his home. He is requesting the current loan to use for personal expenses for his home. The loans from CEPRODEL have helped Roger greatly in improving the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: Personal expenses

loans.name: Amelia Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Amelia del Socorro M. M.,  es comerciante del mercado central de Chinandega su negocio es venta de productos varios lo que le llaman  montón es casada madre de dos niños por los que lucha y sale adelante uno de sus niños esta en edad escolar el otro no porque esta pequeñito, sus financiamientos los ha invertido en su negocio su negocio ha crecido bastante su inventario ha crecido tiene cinco años de trabajar con Ceprodel y se siente bien agradecida con estos financiamientos ya que los ha invertido muy bien y su calidad de vida ha mejora do bastante.
texts.en: Amelia works as a merchant in the central market of Chinandega selling various products. She is a married mother of two children, whom she works hard for to make headway. One of is school age while the other one is still little. Amelia has used her financing to invest in her business. Her business has grown a lot and so has her inventory. She has worked with Kiva partner Ceprodel for the past five years and feels grateful for the the loans since they have helped her make good investments and her quality of life has improved quite a bit.

loans.use: Purchase cosmetics, toys, etc.

loans.name: Gloria Eufemia

texts.es: La señora Gloria Eufemia V. es comerciante del mercado central, desde hace 50 años  su negocio es venta de mariscos y está ubicado en el sector marisco su financiamiento lo solicito para comprar pescados de dos tipos de variedad,  tiene seis años de trabajar con Ceprodel y con estos financiamientos ha superado su calidad de vida trabaja todos los días de la semana no descansa es luchadora y se esfuerza bastante.
texts.en: Gloria is a merchant in the central market. For the past 50 years her business has sold seafood and in the seafood area of the market. She is requesting the loan to purchase two kinds of fish. She has worked with Kiva partner Ceprodel for the past six years, and the loans have helped her improve her quality of life. She works every day of the week without rest. She is a fighter and works very hard.

loans.use: Purchase seafood

loans.name: Walter Daniel

texts.es:
WALTER DANIEL O. C.,Trabaja como Vigilante en la Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería Uní, ES padre de familia de cuatro hijos dos se encuentran en el colegio.
el prestamo solicitado es para la compra de de materiales de construcción  de su casa va cambiar el Sistema Eléctrico de su casa, y el resto en gastos familiares  que tiene pendiente.
texts.en:
Walter Daniel O. C. works as a watchman in the National University of Engineering (UNI). He is the father of a family of four children. Two of them are in school.

He is applying for the loan to purchase construction materials for his house. He is going to change the electrical system in his house and use the rest for family expenses that are pending.

loans.use: Construction materials for his house, and pending family expenses.

loans.name: Doralia De Los Ángeles

texts.es: La Sra. Doralia de los Ángeles E. H. ella se dedica al negocio de la venta de lotería y raspadita ella vende ambulante, tiene veinte y tres años de dedicarse a esta actividad, ella ya tiene a sus clientes a quienes les vende las raspaditas y loterías, es acompañada y  tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  cinco  créditos con CEPRODEL y   cada uno lo ha realizado para la compra de lotería y raspadita para ampliarle a su negocio y poder abastecer a sus clientes, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella  ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Sra. Doralia de los Ángeles E. H. works as a walking vendor of lottery tickets and scratch-off games. She has worked in this business for 23 years. She already has her customers to whom she sells scratch-off and lottery tickets. She is in a relationship and has a son of school age. She has had five loans with CEPRODEL, and she has taken out each one for the purchase of lottery and scratch-off tickets to increase her business and be able to supply her customers. The loans from CEPRODEL have benefited her greatly, since in this way she has improved her living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: Lottery sales

loans.name: Flor De María

texts.es: La señora Flor de María M. P. es comerciante del Mercado central desde hace  8 años tiene un salón de belleza en el cual tiene dos  trabajadoras junto con ella, es casada y tiene un hijo en edad escolar por el cual se esfuerza para sacarlo adelante este financiamiento lo solicito para comprar tintes y ampollas  de tratamiento para el cabello,  la señora Flor M. tiene siete meses de trabajar con Ceprodel y con estos financiamientos siente que ha crecido su negocio bastante.
texts.en: Señora Flor de María M. P. has been a businesswoman in the central market for 8 years. She has a beauty salon in which she has two workers besides herself. She is married and has a son of school ago, for whom she exerts herself to help him advance. She is applying for this loan to buy dyes and vials of hair treatments. Señora Flor M. has been working with CEPRODEL for seven months, and with these loans she feels that she has grown her business quite a bit.

loans.use: Buy merchandise, dyes, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Dalila De Fátima

texts.es: La Sra. Dalila de Fátima E. E. ella se dedica al negocio de la venta de lotería y raspadita ella vende ambulante, tiene quince años de dedicarse a esta actividad, ella ya tiene a sus clientes a quienes les vende las raspaditas y loterías, es casada actualmente y  tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  cinco  créditos con CEPRODEL y   cada uno lo ha realizado para la compra de lotería y raspadita para ampliarle a su negocio y poder abastecer a sus clientes, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella  ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Sra. Dalila de Fátima E. E. sells lottery and scratch-off tickets as a walking vendor. She has been working in this business for 15 years. She already has customers to whom she sells the scratch-off and lottery tickets. She is married and has a son of school age. She has had five loans with CEPRODEL, and she has taken out each one to purchase lottery and scratch-off tickets to increase her business and be able to supply her customers. The loans with CEPRODEL have benefited her greatly since in this way she has improved her living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: Buy lottery and scratch-off tickets to sell.

loans.name: Angel Alberto

texts.es: ANGEL ALBERTO G. M.,Trabaja Como Carpintero en la Universidad Nacional Autónoma de Nicaragua.es padre de familia de dos niños y estos se encuentran en edad escolar, el prestamo solicitado es para la compra de materiales de construccion ya que piensa mejorar su casa de habitación reforzar y repellar  paredes de casa y resolver algunos problemas familiares.
texts.en:
Angel Alberto G. M. works as a carpenter at the National Autonomous University of Nicaragua (Universidad Nacional Autónoma de Nicaragua, in Spanish). He has two school-aged children.

The loan requested is for the purchase of construction materials because he plans to make improvements to his house, reinforcing and plastering walls of the house, and to solve some family problems.

loans.use: To remodel his house, reinforcing and plastering walls, and to cover some family expenses.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: La señora Maribel N. H. es trabajadora de un empresa de venta de tela lleva de trabajar con nosotros dos años en los cuales ha tenido financiamientos  par air mejorando su casa de habitación sus cuotas las realiza mensual  tiene dos hijas en edad escolar por las que lucha para sacarlas adelante con sus estudios. La señora N. H. se siente bien agradecida con Ceprodel ya que gracias a estos créditos ella ha mejorado su casa bastante ya tiene un techo digno para ella y sus hijas y su calidad de vida ha mejorado bastante.
texts.en: Maribel N. H. works at a fabric sales company.  She has been working with us for two years and has taken out two loans to make housing improvements.  She makes her loan payments monthly, and has two school-aged children for whom she works hard to get them ahead in their studies.  Ms. N. H. feels very grateful to CEPRODEL because thanks to these loans, she has greatly improved her house and has a decent roof for herself and her daughters, and her quality of life has improved significantly.

loans.use: To purchase blocks, cement, and sand to make housing improvements.

loans.name: Claribel Del Socorro

texts.es: La Señora Claribel del Socorro B. G. es comerciante del Mercado central de Chinandega tiene su negocio de venta de productos varios lo que le llaman montón, tiene cinco años de trabajar con estos financiamientos los cuales le han ayudado a superar su negocio  ya que ha incrementado su inventario este financiamiento lo solicito para comprar juguetes y ropa de niño es viuda y tiene dos hijos pero ninguno a su cargo ella lucha por si sola para salir adelante tiene dos trabajadoras en su tienda y ha salido adelante tanto en su negocio como en su casa.
texts.en: Claribel del Socorro B. G. is a merchant at the Chinandega central market.  She has a business called Montón where she sells various products.  She has been working with these loans for five years and they have helped her to succeed with her business because she has increased her inventory.  The loan requested is to purchase toys and children’s clothing.  She is a widow and has two children, but neither of them is dependent upon her.  She works for herself alone to get ahead.  She has two employees at her house and has progressed in her business as well as at home.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise to stock her store - household appliances, clothing, toys, etc.

loans.name: Salvadora De Jesús

texts.es: La señora Salvadora de Jesús Z. es trabajadora de la alcaldía de Chinandega se desempeña en el área de limpieza pública tiene de trabajar cinco años y su financiamiento lo solicito para hacerle una mejora a su casa ya que compro unos zinc que le vendían a precio favorable para reparar la parte del baño de su casa en la  entrevista que tuvimos con ella nos manifestó que los financiamientos que le hemos brindado le han servido de mucho porque con estos ha mejorado su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Salvadora de Jesús works in public cleaning at the Chinandega town hall, where she has been for five years.  She is requesting her loan to make housing improvements since she bought zinc sheets that they sold to her at a good price to repair part of the bathroom of her house.  In our interview with her, she told us that the loans that we have provided to her have been of much use because with them, she has improved her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: Consumption - to buy zinc sheets for her house

loans.name: Julia Justina

texts.es:
JULIA JUSTINA M. O.,Trabaja como Conserje en el Instituto Manuel Olivares Rodríguez.
el prestamo solicitado es para  utilizarlo en la compra de Materiales Construcción de su vivienda va a remodelar  un cuarto de habitación.
texts.en:
Julia Justina M. O. works as a caretaker at the Manuel Olivares Rodrígez Institute.

The loan requested is for the purchase of construction materials to remodel a bedroom of her house.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials to remodel a bedroom of her house.

loans.name: María Eliza

texts.es:
La señora maría Eliza L. J. es comerciante del Mercado mayoreo el bisne desde hace 30 años su negocio está ubicado a una cuadra del sector comercio es una señora luchadora y emprendedora lucha por salir adelante, viuda, y sin hijos a su cargo.
Lleva cinco años de trabajar con Ceprodel en los cuales los financiamientos la han superado bastante ya que su negocio ha crecido bastante y su casa la ha mejorado con las utilidades que le han quedado.
texts.en: María Eliza has been a wholesale merchant for the past 30 years. Her business is located one block from the commercial center. She is a hard-working and enterprising woman who works hard to make headway. She is a widow and has no children under her care. She has worked with Kiva partner Ceprodel for the past five years, and the loans have helped her improve her quality of life quite a bit since her business has grown and her home has improved its utilities.

loans.use: Purchase supplies for her business

loans.name: Juana Patricia

texts.es: La señora Juana patricia N. L. es trabajadora de una empresa de venta de tela imperio eternidad el cual está ubicado frente al mercado central, lleva tres créditos con la institución los cuales los paga con cuotas quincenales   y sus financiamientos los saca para realizarles mejoras a su casita en la entrevista que tuve con ella me manifestó que se siente muy agradecida con la institución ya que le hemos dado créditos con una tasa baja y que gracias a estos ha mejorado su casas y su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Juana works for a business selling fabrics in front of the central market. She has had three loans with this institution, which she pays every other week, and her financing has helped her make improvements to her home. In an interview she said that she feels very grateful to this institution because it has given her loans with a low interest rate, and thanks to these she has improved her home and her quality of life.

loans.use: Supplies

loans.name: María De Jesús

texts.es: La Sra. María de Jesús C. G. ella es trabajadora activa del colegio público “Los Espinoza” San Pablo desempeñándose como maestra de Educación Secundaria tiene  veinte y seis año de trabajar como docente, es Casada actualmente tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  cinco créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Ms. María de Jesús C. G. is an active employee of "Los Espinoza", a public school of San Pablo where she works as a secondary school teacher. She has been working as a teacher for six years already. She is married and has a son of school age. She has been granted 5 loans by Ceprodel, and she has used every single one of them to buy building materials to enlarge and improve her house. She has deeply benefited from the loans received from Ceprodel, as through this mean her living conditions and those of her family have improved.

loans.use: To buy sand, cement, stone, gravel.

loans.name: Norberto

texts.es:
NORBERTO C.,trabaja como Vigilante en el mercado Commema Mayoreo de Managua, es padre de familia de un niño y este se encuentra en el colegio, el prestamo solicitado es para solventar agunos gastos medicos.
ha trabajado dos prestamos con ceprodel y estos hansido para salud y su vivienda.
texts.en:
Norberto C. is a security guard working for COMMEMA* at the Wholesale Market of Mangua. He is a family man, and he has a son who is attending college. The loan he is requesting will be used to settle a few medical expenses.
He has already been granted two loans by Ceprodel, and they both have been used for health expenses and for his house.

<cite>* COMMEMEA is the acronym for “Corporación Municipal de Mercados de Managua” (Managua Municipal Markets Corporation)</cite>

loans.use: To settle medical expenses.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Paulina Enoe

texts.es: La señora Paulina Enoe C., tiene un negocio en su casa de habitación a cuatro cuadra del bisne, es madre un hijo que estudia en la universidad y por el que se esfuerza bastante, lleva cuatro años de trabajar con nuestra institución y se siente bien agradecida con el personal que la ha atendido ya que con estos financiamientos ha sacado adelante a su hijo y su casa ha mejorado bastante.
texts.en: Ms. Paulina Enoe C. runs a shop in her house, located four blocks from El Bisne. She has a son who attends university, and it is for him that she works very hard. She has been working with our institution for four years and she is deeply thankful to the personnel who has assisted her, as thanks to these loans she has provided for her son and has made a few improvements to her house.

loans.use: To buy fruits to prepare drinks and plastic bags.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: La señora Ana Maria S. C. es trabajador de la Escuela Efrain Tijerino de Chinandega, se desempeña como  maestra de primaria desde hace 27 años, es  soltera tiene 04 hijos pero solo 02 dependen de ella,  habita en el Barrio Roberto Gonzalez, lleva 02 años trabajando con CEPRODEL, ha obtenido 02 creditos con los cuales ha mejorado su condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Ana Maria S. C. works at the Tijerino de Chinandega school. She has been a primary school teacher for 27 years. She is single with four children, but only two of them are dependent on her. She lives in the Roberto Gonzalez neighborhood. She has been working with CEPRODEL for two years and has so far received 2 loans that have enabled her to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: Buy materials (bricks and cement).

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es: El Sr. Manuel de Jesús G. él es trabajador activo del colegio público “Instituto Nacional San Rafael del Sur” desempeñándose como director del colegio tiene  veinte y tres año de trabajar como docente. Ha tenido  nueve créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Manuel de Jesús G. is a hard-working man.  He is the principal of the “Instituto Nacional San Rafael del Sur” school.  He has been a teacher for twenty-three years.  He has had nine loans from CEPRODEL and each one has been used to buy building materials to extend and improve his house.  The CEPRODEL loans have benefited him greatly since they have enabled him to improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: Sand, cement, stone and gravel

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Bathroom repair

loans.name: Aura Lidia

texts.es: La Sra. Aura Lidia E. G. ella es trabajadora activa del Ministerio de Salud desempeñándose como Auxiliar de Enfermería tiene  veinte y cinco años de trabajar para esta institución, es casada actualmente. Ha tenido  seis créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Mrs. Aura Lidia E. G. is an active worker for the Ministry of Health. She is an Assistant Nurse and has worked for this institution for twenty five years. She is presently married. She has taken out six loans from CEPRODEL and has taken out each one to purchase construction materials to enlarge and improve her home.  The loans with Ceprodel have really benefitted her since she has been able to improve the quality of life for herself and for her family.

loans.use: Sand, cement, stone, gravel, tiles.

loans.name: Gustavo Adolfo

texts.es:
GUSTAVO ADOLFO S. B., Trabaja como Contador A en la Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería. es padre de familia de un niño y este se encuentra en el colegio, el prestamo solicitado es para la compra de materiales de construcción va invertirlo en cambiar el techo de su casa.
ha trabajado cuatro prestamo con ceprodel y estos han sido para el mejoramiento de su vivienda.
texts.en: Gustavo Adolfo S. B. works as an accountant at the Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería (National University of Engineering).  He is father to one child who is in school.  The loan which he is requesting will be used to buy building materials and to replace the roof of his house.  He has had four loans with CEPRODEL and they have all been used to improve his house.

loans.use: To purchase building materials and replace the roof of his house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Payment of university fees

loans.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es: La Sra. Norma del Carmen S. H. es trabajadora Activa del colegio público “CERMA” desempeñándose como Maestra de Educación Primaria tiene diecinueve  años de trabajar para esta institución, es casada actualmente tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  cuatro   créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Norma del Carmen S. H. works as an elementary school teacher at CERMA school.  She has been working for the school for nineteen years.  She is married and has two school-age children.  She has had four loans from CEPRODEL and each one has been used to buy building material to extend and improve her house.  CEPRODEL's loans have benefited her greatly since they have enabled her to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: Sand, cement, stone, blocks and paint

loans.name: Ana Mercedes

texts.es: La señora Ana Mercedes L. A., se dedica a la Edificacion de Ropa de Mujeres y varones, habita en el Viejo,  es casada con 02 hijos en edades escolares y es primera vez que solicita credito en CEPRODEL para compra de una Maquina de Coser para poder brindar mejor servicio a sus clientes en sus vestuarios.
texts.en: Ana Mercedes L. A. dedicates herself to making women and men’s clothing.  She lives in El Viejo, is married, and has two school-aged children.  This is the first time she requests a loan with CEDPRODEL to purchase a sewing machine, in order to provide better service for her customers with her clothing.

loans.use: To purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Yesica Janet

texts.es: La Sra. Yesica Janet B. M. es trabajadora Activa de la empresa D.G.I desempeñándose como Analista de Recaudación tiene dos  años de trabajar para esta institución. Ha tenido  cuatro   créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este crédito lo está solicitando para cambiarle el techo a su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Yesica Janet B. M. is currently an employee at a company called D.G.I., in the role of Collections Analyst.  She has been working for this institution for two years.  

She has had four loans with CEPRODEL, and has taken each one in order to buy construction materials to expand and improve her home.  She is requesting this loan in order to replace her roof.

The loans through CEPRODEL have greatly benefited her by allowing her to improve her and her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase zinc, beams, screws and to pay for manual labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase some sheets of zinc and pay for some household expenses.

loans.name: Esteban Marín

texts.es:
El Sr. Esteban Marín R. M.trabaja en la Alcaldía Municipal de Chinandega desempeñándose como Vigilante,  habita en la Julio Cesar Tinoco,  lleva 06 créditos con CEPRODEL y tiene créditos desde el 2002.
El va a utilizar el crédito para ser utilizado en los gastos médicos de su mama ya que la tiene muy enferma y no cuenta con los suficientes recursos para cumplir con todas sus necesidades.

Esteban R. M.ha demostrado ser una persona muy cumplida con sus obligaciones y está muy agradecido con la Institución por brindarle apoyo cuando lo ha necesitado.
texts.en:
Esteban Marín R. M.works as a security guard at the Town Hall in Chinandega.  He lives in Julio Cesar Tinoco, and has had 6 loans with CEPRODEL since 2002.  He will use the loan to pay for his mother’s medical expenses, as she is very sick and he does not have enough resources to cover all of her needs.

Esteban Roques M.has demonstrated himself to be very punctual with his obligations, and is extremely thankful to the institution for providing him support when he has needed it.

loans.use: For personal expenses.

loans.name: Juan Boanerges

texts.es: El Sr. Juan Boanerges G. G. es trabajador Activo de la empresa D.G.I desempeñándose como Guarda de Seguridad tiene tres  años de trabajar para esta institución. Ha tenido  dos   créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Juan Boanerges G. G. is currently an employee at a company called D.G.I., where he works as a security guard.  He has been working for this enterprise for three years.  He has had two loans with CEPRODEL, and has taken each one in order to buy construction materials to expand and improve his home.  The loans with CEPRODEL have greatly benefited him, by allowing him to improve his and his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase sand, cement, stone, cinder blocks, paint.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To make home improvements.

loans.name: Josue Abraham

texts.es: JOSUE ABRAHAM M. A., Trabajo como  Responsable de la Unidad  de planilla de la Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería. es padre de familia de tres hijos y estos se encuentran en edad escolara, el prestamo solicitado es para invertir en gastos medicos para su mama.
texts.en: JOSUE ABRAHAM M. A. is in charge of the Payroll Unit at the National University of Engineering.  He is the father of three school-aged children.  He is requesting a loan to pay for medical expenses for his mother.

loans.use: To pay for some family problems related to illness.

loans.name: Gioconda De La Cruz

texts.es:
La señora Gioconda M. M. es trabajadora de la Alcaldia de Chinandega se desempeña como operaria de limpieza publica desde hace 22 años es casada y tiene 06 hijos pero todos estan casados y ninguno depende de ella.
Doña M. M. Solicita credito con ceprodel desde el año 2007 ha obtenido 4 creditos los cuales ha utilizado para reparar su vivienda poco a poco y ha demostrado ser muy punctual con sus obligaciones.
texts.en: Gioconda M. M. is an employee at the Town Hall of Chinandega.  She has been a public building cleaner for 22 years.  She is married and has 6 children, however they are all married and no longer depend on her.  Ms. M. M. has obtained credit through CEPRODEL since 2007.  She has had 4 loans that she has used to improve her home little by little.  She has demonstrated herself to be very punctual with her financial obligations.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
La Sra. Dolores V. P.,  es comerciante activa del mercado Santos Bárcenas su negocio es venta de tamales, cuajada fresca y ahumada, los que elabora en su casa y posteriormente se traslada al mercado para realizar  sus ventas al  por mayor y al detalle, cabe mencionar que ella inicio con pequeña cantidad y con un capital de C$500.00 el cual fue producto de su esposo, actualmente su negocio está bien establecido y así a obtenidos buenas ganancias y han logrado a mejorar su vivienda. 
Este crédito fue utilizado para compra de productos para elaboración de tamales y cuajada  tales como: maíz, leña, cal, cuajada en borona.
texts.en:
Dolores V. P. is currently a merchant at the Santos Bárcenas market.   Her business involves the sale of tamales and fresh and smoked curd, which she makes in her home and then transfers to the market to sell at wholesale and at retail.  It should be mentioned that she started with a small amount of capital, $500.00 Nicaraguan Córdobas, which was provided by her husband.  Currently, her business is well established, she has obtained good earnings from it, and has managed to make some improvements to her home.  

This loan was used to buy ingredients for making tamales such as:  corn, wood, lime, and curd.

loans.use: To purchase corn, wood, lime and curd.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
Don Jose Antonio H. P. es trabajador del Centro de salud,  El Realejo se desempeña como Tecnico de Malaria Tiene ya 19 años de laborar bpara el Minsa .
Don Jose Antonio lleva ya 05 creditos con CEPRODEL con los cuales ha logrado ir reparando su vivienda poco a poco y brindarle una major forma de vida a su familia, esta vez solicito credito para reparar su cocina ya que con las aguas de los ultimos dias se le daño, es un cliente  muy responsable y cumplido con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Jose Antonio H. P. is an employee at the El Realejo Medical Center.  He is a Malaria Technician, and has been working for the Ministry of Health for 19 years.  

Jose Antonio has had 5 loans with CEPRODEL, with which he has managed to make improvements to his home little by little, and provide a higher standard of living for his family.  This time, he requested a loan to repair his kitchen, which was damaged by the rains of the past few days.  He is a very responsible client, who is punctual with his payments.

loans.use: To purchase construction supplies (zinc, lumber, nails).
